choices: 3"--the businesswoman
1"--the family
1/4"--the coeds
1.content:
You look down at the watch on your left wrist casually, trying not to look like someone trying to decide whether to touch the thing or rip it off and throw it away. You're standing at a gate at the airport, waiting for a flight to Miami. You don't have a ticket.

You're at the gate because of the watch, which isn't a watch at all, but a size displacer. You've been helping Professor Martin with it this year--your junior year, to be specific. He left for spring break two days ago, and that's when you realized that rather than heading back to your hometown for a dull break, you could use this to fly your way down for a free vacation.

But having used it once to get through security, now you're not so sure. You flip idly through the sizes and options, wondering whether to go through with it.

"We'll be boarding flight 409 to Miami shortly," comes the voice of a stewardess, and you decide to go through with it. What the heck, you made it this far, right? Now all you have to do is decide who to sneak onto the plane with--without getting noticed.

You could shrink yourself to three inches tall, and sneak into the briefcase of a distracted businesswoman, you think. She's so distracted with her blackberry that she'll never notice.

Then again, you could go a bit smaller and sneak on with the family--mom, dad, bored-looking teenage girl, hyperactive boy, young girl. The teenager's purse is laying open and you could go for that.

Or if you really wanted to be daring, you could go really small and hitch a ride on one of four pairs of flip-flops belonging to four gorgeous coeds.

So where to?
1.title: At the gate

choices: Go for the carry-on.
Stick to the plan, go into the briefcase.
11.content:
You nonchalantly move over by the bank of chairs the woman is perched on, and hitting a few buttons on the bracelet, you activate the device. You feel the weird sinking feeling of the device activating. When you open your eyes, the world is once again enormous, and you quickly dash underneath the giant benches, and start heading for the briefcase.

You reach the case, and look up at the nylon-covered legs of the businesswoman, and can't help but smile. One foot swings aimlessly, leg crossed over knee. Delightful.

You head for the briefcase, and wonder to yourself if she's heading home or heading off to a meeting. It's then that you notice her carry-on bag. You could find out if she's going or staying, you suppose. And it might be safer than the briefcase--what if she wants notes while on the plane?

Then again, the carry-on isn't open. You'd have to find a way inside....
11.title: The Businesswoman

choices: Jump ship
Stay and say hello
111.content:
The carry-on - a leathery purse some twice your height - looms beside the woman's stationary foot, while the other swings above you. It is with trepidation that you approach, careful to remain watchful, in case to need to jump away. No telling when she may re-cross her legs the other way, stamping her foot down.

In time you reach it, discovering as you do so that to get inside you'll have to climb up to reach the zipper, and then somehow move that aside to allow you egress. No problem, right?

Who'd have thought it was so hard to climb a purse. The material is soft and easy to grip, but also slippery. Several times you almost fall, and all the way through you are sure that the woman will look down at any moment and spot your feeble attempts to stow away.

Somehow, you reach the summit. You keep telling yourself not to look up at the giantess - it would only scare you. Instead, you bend all the force of your will to somehow opening the bag. To no effect.

You're puny at this scale, with muscles that a mouse would scoff at. A simple zipper defies you, and you feel utterly pathetic.

You've been here too long. The woman's hand approaches, merely to grasp the handle, but she's sure to see you if you don't move NOW.

Will you abandon this project and look for an easier mule, or see if the woman is willing to be a partner in crime?
111.title: Defiant

choices: Time to Downsize
Head over to the slackers
Pay a visit to the duty-free
1111.content:
Part of 'sneaking aboard' the 'plane involved not being seen; that would defeat the whole object of this exercise. And while this woman may be hot, you're not sure that you can trust anyone to be one hundred percent helpful to a three-inch tall man. You know that you yourself certainly wouldn't be.

So you roll away from the bag as the giantess' hand firmly grasps it and effortlessly hauls the structure into the air. Easy come, easy go. Scuttling back underneath the chair, you look around for a better target, and ponder the need to change your size at all.

Three inches is a safe height, but also a very noticeable one. Should you try reactivating your watch to reduce your stature yet further?

If your dimensions aren't bothering you, then you've already seen another likely group of people that may unknowingly help you. Clustered around a small table, laughing uproariously, a mixed group of slacker-types - male and female - are engaged in a game of cards to pass the time while they wait to board. Their bags are pretty bulky, and are likely to have much hiding space inside them. Of course, one need hardly mention the dangers involved with associating with them...

Across the way is a small duty free shop, where a few people may be stocking up before their trip. You can't see anyone in there, but then it is fairly distant and the people may be behind stands or something. It may be worth a shot taking a closer inspection.
1111.title: Jump Ship

choices: ...sticks the purse at her feet-she wants to talk
...puts the purse overhead-It'll be a LONG flight
1112.content:
You're undecided about what to do, knowing that this could be you're last chance to board. You hesitate, and the decision is made for you.

"Flight 409 to Miami is now boarding. All passengers please proceed to the gate." The stewardess's voice comes through the PA system, somewhat louder at your current size. You watch the businesswoman's head jerk up, and then her massive hand reaches down to pick up her purse and briefcase.

You gape for a moment, than quickly grab the zipper pull as her hand pulls up the handle. Even so, you nearly fall off as the purse jerks into the air. You hang on desperately, experiencing a motion that feels like a super fast elevator on steroids.

The businesswoman places her purse on her lap. You have a moment to catch your breath and gaze in awe at her massive torso as she sticks a few documents in her briefcase, closes it with a large SNAP and latches it. She then turns her massive gaze towards the purse to put away her blackberry and catches sight of you. Her breath catches in her throat and her mouth falls open in shock.

"What...?" she breathes out, staring. Before you can think of anything to say (how to deal with being discovered 3 inches tall not being taught in college), the purse rockets into the air again.

Again you rise into the air, this time right up to the woman's face, she wants a better look. You get the chance to take in her face as she simply stares. She has nicely tanned, smooth (although at your size NO makeup can hide those small blemishes) skin, full red lips, blue eyes and medium length brown hair. She's only a year or so older than you are, in fact. You're musing is interrupted, however, when she whispers, almost to herself:

"Are you real?" Her question prompts an immediate response:

"I am indeed, my name's Mike." you inform her in a fairly loud voice. She nearly jumps out of her skin in shock at your voice-and almost sends you plummeting down towards her lap- and starts talking, forming incomplete questions that you can't understand, and blasting you with her voice and breath (which is actually fairly aromatic).

She finally collects herself after the pained expression on your face registers. She fixes you with a stare from a large blue eye and asks:

"What are you? And why are you on my purse" Impressed by her composure, you decide to go with honesty.

You tell her that you're a college student on break who shrunk himself down to stow a ride, and that you had thought that her purse would be a good place to stow away.

Her lips quirk at your tale, almost smiling. A number of expressions pass over her face; you can't tell what they mean. Before this can go any farther, however, the voice of the stewardess again rings out:

"All passengers, this if final boarding for flight 409 to Miami. All passengers please board immediately"

The businesswoman looks up again, an urgent expression on her face. She looks at you again, considering. You're a little nervous as she decides what to do, still looking at you intensely. Finally, she makes up her mind.

Her hand brushes past you as she reaches over and pulls the zipper of the purse partly open and places her blackberry inside.

"Quick, get in." She tells you, gathering her possessions and dealing with you in an efficient, businesslike manner.

Unable to believe you're luck, and not wanting to miss this chance, you quickly climb into the purse. You barely have time to glimpse lipstick, makeup and various other items before she zips the purse all the way closed, leaving you in darkness.

You sit there nervously as she gets up and approaches the gate, purse around her shoulder. A number of items knock into you as you tumble around the purse, giving you little time to think. The businesswoman gets through the gate and boards the plane, with you in the purse under her arm. She makes her way to her seat, stows her briefcase and...
1112.title: Final boarding with a new arrangement

choices: On the Food Table. A little risky but ideal for Meal Time and Talking.
In her Ear. Secure and Less Likely to Spot, if akward.
11121.content:
After several minutes of being bumped about you eventually feel the bag make one final large thud beneath you, before all movement ceases and you become aware of muffled conversations from the outside of your current environment.

You sit down on what in the darkness you gather to be her face cream top and contemplate your current circumstance. You're clearly now on the plane itself, which is half of the plan you'd devised in order to get to Spring Break for free. The problem (or advantage, its hard to tell at the moment) is that your current host is aware of your presence and you confess to not knowing how or what she might do with you when she has the opportunity to do so. She's certainly confused, that much was clear - but whether that will turn to pity, rage or anything in between you can't say. She might be impressed at your scheme - or she might scamper it all and turn you in when you least expect it. Or worse, keep you all for herself and make you do who knows what for her cruel pleasure?

One saving advantage you do have over her - she has no idea how you're able to change sizes, and if the need arises you can either grow back to full size or shrink further to aid you in a possible escape.

You glance up to where the tiniest pricks of light emerge from the small holes between the Zipper, realising that its likely that the woman above you is likely doing much the same thing as you are. All at once though you suddenly feel the bag lift, though with a care which suggests that she is concerned about your possible injury by makeup, which is somewhat encouraging.

As the bag stops moving you realise that you're now clearly on the Businesslady's lap, the distinct difference between a floor and covered flesh just about noticeable. The zipper opens halfway, and glancing up painfully into the sudden light of the aircraft outside you see her head and eyes loom over you, spotting you quickly. They disappear, but in all of a second her smooth hand enters the bag and forms a palm, inviting you to hop on.

Deciding to give the giantess some trust (if you didn't didn't get on she'd probably just pick you up, or even leave you inside, and to be honest you don't want to be stuck in this musky bag for hours) you climb onto the pink flesh of her plam, susprised at how soft her skin feels - she's clearly the manicuring type, you gather.

Feeling your form on her hand it rises up out of the bag, her fingers moving up to form a barrier, which after the initial worry you realise is simply her attempting to prevent anyone else from seeing you - a smart thought, though you gather that she's in First Class and she appears to be sitting alone. You feel a little unsteady as you are brought up to her face, which has a warm smile on it.

"How are you?" She whispers, partly out of worry that speaking normally might hurt your ears, and other out of a desire to avoid being heard herself and drawing attention. "Sorry if the journey in my handbag was a little rough, but I wasn't sure where else to put you short of embarassment." You realise she's probably talking about various pocket or even interior areas of her clothing, and from her looks this is a logical enough thing to say as she is extremely pretty, even in working clothes. You get the impression she's the type of woman who could wear any costume and make it look sexy.

"Well to introductions. You said your name was Mike? Well I'm Rebecca Summers, taking a well deserved break to Miami from my job as Assistant Director of Evenligh Ltd (which you have vaguely heard of). I have to say I'm pretty impressed at the way you've snuck onboard, not to mention that you choose me as a travelling companion."

You give your best smile. "Well, I thought you needed the company, since its unfair that someone as pretty as you has to travel alone." You inwardly think that sucks as a reason but it seems to make Rebecca happy and you breathe a sigh of relief. You looks like you've been good to risk it by talking to her as she presently seems unlikely to rat you out. Once the intiial safety checks are done and the stewardess have passed, Rebecca finds the best place to have you for the duration of the journey is..
11121.title: Conversation With A Giantess

choices: It's a businessman, wanting to pass the flight by chatting her up
It's a rich air-head, fascinated by her 'doll'
111211.content:
Simple,you suppose. As Rebecca sits up properly in her seat, you feel once more the full intimidatory effect that her vastly greater bulk gifts her with. You have to crane your head back to look at her, and even then you can't fully make out her face beyond her chest.

She ducks down, pouncing with a speed that puts you in mind of a bird of prey snatching a helpless field-mouse. "Whadday think," she smirks, her eyes inches from your own, "clever, eh? Hiding in plan sight, and all that. If anyone asks, you're just a doll, right?"

You nod your head slowly. To argue now wouldn't be a good idea, you reckon. And the plan isn't that bad; assuming no one gets a close look, the story should pass muster.

Then a shadow falls across you - the passeneger in the opposite sideof the aisle is leaning across with a question for your generous co-conspirator.
111211.title: On the Food Table

choices: She grabs you.
Throw yourself down onto Rebecca's lap.
1112112.content:
“OhmyGod! What’s that? Is that like a toy?”

The voice isn’t Rebecca’s. Rebecca talks like an intelligent person. No, this voice belongs to the flightiest person on Earth. Or maybe her flightiness is simply magnified by the fact that she’s over one-hundred feet tall compared to you.

You stiffen at once, but you allow your eyes to shift slightly to see who’s taken an interest in you.

Standing beside Rebecca’s seat and leaning over is a pretty blonde girl, no older than 20. And there’s no way she paid for this first-class ticket on her own, so for now you must assume she’s a spoiled rotten brat who’s never had to lift a finger in her whole life.

But she doesn’t mind the thought of lifting your entire little body, as her brightly painted fingernails reach toward you.

Okay, now Rebecca had looked huge, but seeing a girl bending down and reaching straight toward you--now you truly feel teeny tiny.

Rebecca speaks up, thank goodness, and the titanic blonde retracts her hand. “Uh, yes,” Rebecca says. “He--It--It’s a doll that’s been in my family for a few generations. It’s very fragile, but, uh, I like to keep it with me on long trips. Reminds me of home.”

“Awww, that’s like so cool,” the flighty girl says. “Can I hold it?”

“I’d rather you didn’t--”

But the air-head isn’t listening. She wants a better look at you, and dammit, she’s going to get it. Of course. The brat’s used to getting her way.
1112112.title: Giant blonde brat

choices: "April, give the lady her doll back."
"Let's see how much we can buy it for."
11121121.content:
The girl grasps you with a vice-like grip that takes the breath right out of you, while Rebecca is trying to get you back, or at least convince her to be careful. "Please, be gentle! It's really..."

"OMG, this doll is so adorable!" The ditzy girl blurts in your face. "And sooo life like, too!" She turns you around to get a better look at you. "So what's it do? Does it talk? Does it wet itself?"

"It does nothing!" Rebecca shouts. "It's a doll!"

"Oh, well, that's lame." She turns you around to get a look at your face. "Still, this doll is soooo cute!" She forcefully caresses you in her chest, giving you the ultimate bear hug. You wouldn't mind being in this situation if you couldn't hear and feel your bones cracking.

"Please, could you be gentle? I don't want it broken." The air-head instead turns into the aisle and brings you to an older, but well-to-do man which you assume to be her father.

"Daddy! I found this really life-like doll one lady had! Can I keep it? Pretty please?" The father turns and says,
11121121.title: Handle With Care

choices: Rebecca puts you away for safe keeping.
Rebecca is still interested in talking.
111211211.content:
Your captor stamped her feet in a mini temper tantrum. "But daddy! I want it!"

"No buts, April. Remember what happened last time you wanted something else that belonged to someone?"

"Yeah, you offered to pay top dollar, and then when he sued you, you filed a lawsuit that made him give it to me."

"Exactly. I can't afford to do that every single time you want something. We had to get you a smaller yacht for your birthday. Remember how upset you got? It was, if I remember correctly, 'unforgivable.'"

The girl droops her head and walks back dejected to Rebecca. "I'm sorry for taking your doll. Here you go." She say you back down on Rebecca's lap. As she leaves she mutters under her breath, "Bitch."

Rebecca inspects you. "Are you okay? Is anything broken?"

You weakly smile. "Nothing that can't heal."
111211211.title: A Reasonable Parental Figure

choices: Shrink out of sight
Bask in Rebecca's attention
1112112112.content:
"This is no time for jokes," Rebecca says urgently, her hand sliding beneath you to raise you to her face. "At your size, I'm pretty sure you can't take much damage."

Her gaze roves allover your body, and you feel more like a lesser creature than ever. Maybe she should take you to a vet? However, your pride takes second seat to panic as you realise that the businesswoman is talking out loud, quite oblivious to the passengers all around. That blonde brat and her father already took an interest in an inanimate doll, how many more will start to look at you if they think you're living?

Panic, panic, panic. Perhaps it's time to shrink smaller and escape the public eye. Step one of the plan has already been achieved, and you want to avoid further damage if at all possible.

But then again, this concern from Rebecca is touching your jaded heart... Who cares if some tourist sees the two of you conversing? It's a free country.
1112112112.title: Is Now Really the Time?

choices: Rebecca agrees to take the money
Rebecca makes a grab for you
111211212.content:
"It's not for sale," Rebecca insists.

"Nonsense. I'm a very wealthy man, my dear, and whatever my little darling wants, she gets. Should I start at a thousand dollars?"

Oh dear. While Rebecca does seem very nice, she has only just met you, so who knows when she'll cave to this rich man's offers? If only the girl wasn't grabbing you quite so tightly, you could reach for the watch and size-change your way out of this predicament. But then Rebecca makes a save.

"Do you have the cash on you, sir? No offence, but I'm not going to just accept your word and take a cheque that's going to bounce right into the stratosphere."

"Now you call my honour into question? Well madam, once this 'plane lands, I would be happy to accompany you to the nearest bank and give you however much money you desire!"

"Whatever. Just give me my property back now, please."

"Shut up, hag!" the girl interjects, her hands dropping to sit wrists on waist, dangling you above the floor. "Take my daddy's word for it or I'll - I'll just twist this doll's head off! If I can't have it, I don't see why you should, either!"

There is a pause, and you can detect the worry that Rebecca tries to keep from her voice. "Keep your daughter under control. If any damage should come to my property, I'll sue."

"And I can happily pay whatever the courts demand. It would be worth it to wipe that smugness from you, my dear."

The girl now lifts you before her, one powerful hand wrapped around you, your arms hidden and pinned, while the pads of the second hand's finger and thumb position themselves either side of your head. You can see Rebecca before you, her huge face wracked with worry.
111211212.title: Money Talks

choices: ... in her pink handbag. Sealed but you can change your size again!
... on her lap. You'll have to bide your time and wait for an escape.
1112112121.content:
It is all you can do not to scream in pain right now because whilst the airhead isn't squeezing as tight as she might it's still bloody painful. Of course you also worried that the way your arms are pinned the dumb bimbo might damage your size displacer... or worse, set it off to do who knows what. Regardless you're trapped, and you're feeling very glad that Rebecca's still on your side, money and everything. Even so, you figure your life is worth the chance to get away from this dumb ass of a girl, though how you're gonna manage that and get back to Rebecca is unclear. You know she'll be enhamoured with you for how long, meaning you can't be likely to shrink or row without her noticing. And of course there's no telling where she'll throw you when she's finished. If it was just her and not the blasted father too, you could shrink away and they'd likely think she was just crazy.

Regardless, you figure you need to play along now and tactfully get back to Rebecca the first chance you get. If it becomes clear the air head is going to hurt you by accident too much, you'll escape and be damned with who sees you. If nothing else you'll have several hours til you land to do it, probably shrinking down much smaller and camping out somewhere like Rebecca's inner ear or something so if the air head misplaces her 'dowl' there won't be any chance of her accusing Rebecca of 'stealing it back'.

Carefully so as not to let either the daughter and daddy see you nod your head as easily as you can between her fingers, hoping Rebecca notices. Thankfully she seems to and after a moment appears to make her decision. You wish you could tell her your plan but you like to think since what you've told her already about your size displacer that you'll try to get back to her. "There's no need for that, sir... I'll accept three thousand in cheque, at great hesitation."

"Captial, I knew you would see sense my dear!" Writing it out the father hand it to her and you find the air head thankfully stop hold your head, though her hand is still around your middle. You're definitely going to want to check out your injuries when you get out of this mess - you don't know any bones are broken but you think there'll be some serious bruising. Giggling at an annoying level the bimbo moves back to her seat and places you...
1112112121.title: A Rock and a Hard Pla.... Hand.

choices: Shrink and escape, pain be damned!
Rest and recuperate
11121121211.content:
You barely have time to realise what's going on before you have been released from the girl's grip and plummeted into the shadowy recesses of her handbag. As all light is finally stolen when she zips it closed above you, you can take stock of your injuries.

Your legs are fine, but your arms and ribs in particular are bruised and sore from where the unrelenting grip of the giantess held you captive. Even bending your elbows sends spasms of pain through your body. You need a good lie down.

After bumping into various invisible and hard surfaces, you finally find something soft where you can recline. Probably a handkerchief, or something.

Anyway! You were going to shrink out of here and escape. That was before you realised the incredible agony that you're in. You could shrink small enough to slip through the seams of the bag, but that would require so much effort that you'd almost certainly do yourself an injury. Resting up in the bag for a few hours sounds more tempting, until you realise that the brat could pop in to pick you out at any second.

What's it to be?
11121121211.title: The Handbag

choices: Just a Few Minutes - You're Still on the Plane.
A Few Hours - You're Elsewhere.
111211212112.content:
Well this is annoying - your size displacer is fine and you could shrink down but you're feeling too bruised from your unpleasant experience to get going any time soon. Waiting for a bit seems logical, although you realise that at any minute the bimbo might reach in and try 'playing' with you again. Plus there's no way of knowing where this girl is off to, whether or not she's staying at the same resort or not as Rebecca. You rest for a few hours and you might find that you've already departed the plane. You're inwardly bemoaning the fact that you couldn't have a jetpack or means of flight like some of the size changing types do in the comics to get about.

Then a thought strikes you and despite the odds you smile. There's nothing wrong with your size displacer and there's no way of knowing how long till the bimbo fishes you out. So why not shrink small enough so you won't be found but still not too small to slip out? With any luck if the girl opens the bag - hopefully whilst you're on the plane still - she'll be trying to figure out where you are. In other words keeping that bag open for a good while. Maybe you can even run across her giant sized hand and up her arm until you can find somewhere secure to make a move back towards Rebecca! Of course if you're already elsewhere you'll have additional problems, though Rebecca did tell you the name of the hotel where she'd be staying - somewhere you'd definitely want to be right now, especially if you get to spend your time with your new sexy giant-sized friend - so there's a focal point you know where to head for if that's the case.

You decide to go for it - there's no way you're going through that treatment again. Activating the size displacer you find the hankerchief growing around you until you estimate you've shrunk down from three inches tall to just one eighth of an inch. It's still pitch black in here bar the tiny amount of light you can gleam from the displacer when it's activated, though your eyes are adjusting enough to distern shapes amid the handbag including what you assume is lipstick and tub of sealed nail polish.

It's time to play the waiting game, you figure as you sit down on the hankerchief, rubbing your shoulders to get some feeling back in them in case you have to move fast. Whilst you let yourself rest, you will yourself not to drop off - there's no way of knowing what you happen in a matter of seconds in here lest you get squished by a falling item or a wandering hand.

The question is... how long will it be before your unknowing captor searches for you in here?
111211212112.title: A Smart Plan

choices: Cling to the inside of the bag rather than fall
Drift downward with the contents and hope not to be spotted
1112112121121.content:
Time is hard to track in the cramped void of the girl's bag, but when the sky opens, light streaming in at the extremes of the gigantic hand that is clawing its way down at you, you fear that your time has come.

It's the biggest thing you've ever seen! There was a reaosn that you never reduced yourself below three inches before, for terror of what monsters would be around you. The girl's hand is immense, each finger alone bigger than a jet liner, and it is moving downward with the speed of a rollercoaster.

All is motion as that hand digs around in the darkened rubble, and you re-assess your plan. 'Just climb her finger and arm' you told yourself. Yeah, right!

It's a struggle just to survive, bothered not just by the earthquake but also the noise, like the girl is saying something far above you. She must have noticed your absence, and will dig all the harder to find you!

After an eternity, gravity just up-ends - seems she's going to tip her bag out completely in an effort to discover you!
1112112121121.title: Opportune Moments

choices: Talk to the girl, try to get her on team
Scream for help from someone - anyone - else
11121121212.content:
The giggling is really annoying, being as it is both high in pitch and volume, and echoing from within the cavernous chest above you. The hands have relaxed their grip though, allowing your three-inch form to recline on her fingers while the thumbs rest gently on your chest. Compared to the crushing agony of earlier, it's like Heaven.

You stare upwards, resisting the urge to move your arms to check your injuries, and trying not to blink. Staring upwards you can't see the girl's face, but that doesn't mean she can't see you from her vantage point.

Then the thumbs begin to move, their gigantic heat and weight lifting from your chest and heading further down. They pass out of sight, but then one pushes heavily on your crotch,

The thumb is greater in mass han your entire body, and now it is focussing its attention on the one part of your anatomy you'd rather be left alone. All your careful manequin impersonations are worth nothing when your balls are subjected to such pressure, and a scream erupts.

Then the thumb is removed, and the quiet giggling replaced with a loud bark of pure joy from above. The girl's head pulls into view as she announces: "Ha! I knew it! I knew you were alive!"

Well, that's your secret gone. The hands are now raising you as her gigantic face allows a grin to spread across it, revealing huge teeth. Revealed in her wide eyes is nothing more than foreboding.
11121121212.title: Abandon Plan Time-Bide

choices: You ask the woman her name
You ask the woman to let you rest
You ask the woman to get you some food
111211212121.content:
"Okay, you caught me - I was just trying to get a free flight to Spring Break okay?"

Her immense eyes widen even more, and she suppresses a chuckle with a splutter, one blob of her saliva impacting wetly against your forehead. "Spring Break? Like, that's for loser plebs! You lucked out when you fell into my hands, dude." She closes in on you, as if to whisper, her massive mouth opening to reveal that depthless throat. "Daddy has got a penthouse secured for me and my friends, pool and all. It's going to be EPIC."

Huh. This may have actually worked out for you. For all her ditzy, rich girl persona, she's not bad-looking, and if you can sponge off her generosity to live in luxury, bring it on!

Her lips smash into you without warning, pressing their sticky coating all across you. Warm and wet, the kiss leads to her giggling as she sees your dishevelled reaction.

"Oh yes," she purrs, "I'm going to get my thousand bucks worth with you..."
111211212121.title: Upgrade to First Class

choices: You have shrunk even smaller to evade her gaze and escape
You are still three inches tall, waiting for the party to start
You have grown back to normal, ready to get out of here
1112112121211.content:
"My name?" She looms closer again, her mouth curling in amusement. "Well, if you annoy me, you can call me Death..."

You gasp, but then she laughs, rocking back in her seat. "Kidding!" she says, 'boop'ing your nose with her colossal pinky finger. "My name is Maggie. Pleased to meet you, but I think it's best if you ride out the rest of this trip in my bag. That crone over there's giving me the stink-eye..."

Ignoring whatever protest you may have, Maggie's hand slides you down and into the depths of her cavernous bag, leaving you in darkness. It is a relief to be free of her crushing fingers, and you slump amongst the large, shadowed forms of the woman's make-up kit, purse and other unmentionables.

The land is largely stable, Maggie not moving much, and the cacophony of the outside world is largely muted. Stretching your three-inch tall form out, you contemplate just lying here and resting, Mission accomplished, right? The rest of the flight can pass in peace, the stern eyes of her father and passing stewardesses keeping Maggie from playing with you too openly.

Every now and then the bag's entrance peels open to reveal a watchful eye, checking you're still there, a deep blue vision of an absent yet ever-present goddess. You're safe.

A sleep, to forget your original chosen carrier, and acclimate yourself to this new being who runs your life. Why ever not? As you drift off, you hear a faint giggling, the girl taking some delight in your doll-like form curling up.

However much later, you wake to a log being mashed into the side of your ribs. "Wake up," Maggie whispers as she withdraws her finger. You have moments to scramble upright before the bag flips, departure from the plane causing the girl to carry in beside her rather than in her lap. Gigantic personal items tumble around, and you throw yourself as clear as you can.

The walking motion of the giantess keeps a low-level shudder to constantly rumble throughout your surroundings, but not enough to bring any objects crashing upon you. Scuttling to the side, you keep yourself still and pray that this continues. Ignorant though you are of the outside world, you can make a good guess that you have successfully completed your illegal trip through the friendly skies!

Close to an hour passes before the sky parts, and Maggie's hand snatches you up, too quick for you to resist. She lifts you before her face again, smiling. "So glad you made it through safely. But like I said, it's all gonna be worth it!"

She spins around the room with her arms outstretched, and while the whirling motion is sickening, you can get an idea of the sheer size of the room she's standing in. To you, it's bigger than a small town, but even scaled up you'd place it as somewhere close to the entire floor of a tower building.

At last she stops, and through spinning eyes you can make out the luxurious upholstery about the place, a lengthy bar centrally placed, and a lake-like heated pool steaming up into the air.

Your captor paces away from all of this, toward the edge of the room; it may as well be the edge of the world.

Leaning on the waist-high glass barrier, Maggie clutches you to her chest as she looks out across the city below, the people mere insects at this distance...

"I've always liked this view," she confides in you. "Daddy took me up here when I was young to show off, and I've always liked imaging that those people down there really are that size, really are tiny little bugs before me."

Once more you are brought before her face, and you can see the unbridled excitement there. "With you, I don't have to imagine anymore! We are gonna have sooo much fun together!"

She strides away from the balcony, casually activating the hidden stereo system to pump some thumping pop music across the area. This adds a dancing sway to her step, and she swings you ever more wildly. "This'll do!" she announces, and you are off for another ride.

This time, she is stooping, and you view of her chest is replaced with one of her solid brown boots. She's standing by the poolside, and you can see her other hand cupping an ashtray, in the shape of a familiar leafed plant. She deposits you into it, and then it is placed upon the surface of the water, a simple wash of her arm sending your boat floating away toward the centre of the body.

"Everyone'll be here soon, so I've gotta get ready," Maggie tells you. "Sit tight, and I'll be back soon!"

It must take her some time to actually settle upon an outfit, as minutes have passed before she strolls back in, tanned skin covered only by a skimpy white bikini. As she does come back, in what form does she find the shrunken man she left behind?
1112112121211.title: Straight to the Point

choices: You grow the two of you back to normal size
Growing yourself only, you take her with you as a hostage
Leaving both of you small, you leave her here while you escape
11121121212113.content:
Maggie's return surprises you as you are walking across to the lift down, and you pause. She jumps a little as well, no doubt surprised and a little scared to find a full-grown man in her penthouse.

At her gasp, you grab her shoulders and drag her to face you. "Shh! It's just me! No need to worry!"

"You... you grew back! That's great! But..." she looks down at your torn clothing, at the bruises showing on your skin. "What happened to you?"

You crack a smile, releasing her shoulders to raise her right hand in yours.

"I... I did this? I'm so, so sorry! I don't know my own strength!"

Her hand feels so small and weak, and it's hard to imagine how only a few minutes ago they were titanic, capable of pinning you in their grasp and squeezing you with massive strength. That's why you remain silent, allowing Maggie another question.

"How did this happen? How did you change your size?"

Ah, what the hey. "Size-changing watch. All the rage these days. And no, you can't have it."

"What does it feel like?"

Shrugging, you hold her close while activating the watch, allowing both of you to be caught in the size field, dropping your heights to approximately three inches again. Nothing new for you, but Maggie staggers around in wonder.

"Oh wow, wow, wow! This is amazing! Oh man, when you grow us back I've got a great idea to liven up the party!"

Grow us back? Hah...
11121121212113.title: This Is How It Feels

choices: You join them as a three inch tall man
You join them full-size
You turn your back on the party and go to enjoy Spring Break
111211212121131.content:
A moment later and the full-size pair of you stand in the penthouse once again. Maggie kisses you on the lips in thanks, then outlines her plan, breathlessly.

"You do that thing, that shrinking thing, to each of the guests as they come in. Keep 'em all in a basket, and then bring 'em to me in the pool. I'll be the main attraction of the party!"

Eh, could be fun. With a shrug, you nod your agreement, and set yourself up outside the lift doors while Maggie reclines in the pool, splashing herself idly with the warm water. Throughout your wait, the music continues to blare, and Maggie chatters away, describing each of her friends in detail. They all sound just as conceited and air-headed (and spoiled!) as she is, and her intricate details of their relationships and trysts curl over each other in turn until they're all indistinguishable.

Shrinking the first one is fun. He smiles at you in puzzlement, then protests as you grab him, and finally wails as he shrinks. Feeling him struggle in your grip once you grow back and grab him feels great, and you toss him into the basket with nary a thought.

Each successive shrinkage brings with it reduced pleasure, and it becomes a grinding chore by the time Maggie announces that that's the last, and beckons you to bring the two-dozen shrunken people to her.

You empty them into the pool without remorse, watching them struggle in the water before looking up at the god-like form of their host, looming over them as she treads water.

"Don't just stand there," Maggie shouts up to you, "come and join us!"
111211212121131.title: Conspiracy to Miniaturise

choices: Unnoticed, one of less happy guests reaches the watch
Maggie grabs one of the guests in the throws of passion
The party moves out of the pool
1112112121211312.content:
You've had just about enough of being Maggie's pet, but sticking around to watch her play with some other luckless dopes? Why the hell not!

Slipping off your clothes - ALL of your clothes - you slip into the pool, grinning as miniaturised party-goers are swept away by the ripples you create. Feels good to be this big, to watch the people paddle desperately away. With a simple movement of your arm, you splash enough water to send three people spinning into the air.

Some aren't running, though. A couple of tiny people swim closer, and begin scaling your body, their hands and feet like feathers on your skin.

A pair of particularly bold explorers dive down, teasing at your dick, no doubt fascinated to see one so large - to them, it's bigger than a person! Their tender caresses only cause it to grow ever bigger and harder, rising in the water with them atop it, riding like crazed rodeo clowns.

Watching in amusement as much as arousal, you start as they scream and dive off your dick, wondering what happened. Maggie lands on you heavily, not quite letting you slide into her with one move. A grunt and a wiggle, and the two of you become one.

You kiss as she works away at your erection, and all around the shrunken party guests are joining in, either with each other or the giants in their midst, crawling over the immense bodies to be as close to the action as possible.

There are worse ways to spend Spring Break.
1112112121211312.title: Life of the Party

choices: Head off to party
Arrange a ransom with Maggie's father
Secure yourself somewhere to sleep
111211212121132.content:
You've had enough of this blonde bimbo. Stepping back, you wave goodbye before expanding yourself back to regular size with the watch. Tiny Maggie at your feet has only a moment to scream before you snatch her up, her feeble fists pounding almost imperceptibly at the top of your thumb.

"Now you know how it feels," you smile, while remaining careful to hold her gently. Before you take your leave, you are careful to pick up the phone she left at the bar, as well as the purse from within her handbag. Mainly cards, but a few large-denomination notes - enough to get you started.

"Your Dad was willing to pay a bit to get you a toy man," you say, "so I wonder how much he'll be willing to pay to get his daughter back safe and sound..."

Snapping a photo of her with her own phone, you add kidnap to your list of crimes and wonder what to do next.
111211212121132.title: This Trip Will Pay For Itself

choices: "I have this watch here, which actually is a size displacer."
"I am a doll, that can help you in dangerous situations. Like you said."
1112112122.content:
"I do not want to sell it for any money in the world, it means too much for me."
"If you don't accept the money, I'll break this doll!", the blonde shot back at her.
But Rebecca didn't want to give you up, so she started "If you don't give it to me this instant, im going to-" "You're going to do what? My dad has enough money to win every fight in court! In fact, I'll show you. See?" And with that, this airhead of a girl started to visibly apply pressure on your head.
You didn't want your vacation, or your whole life for that matter, to end so you quickly turned the dial on your watch to make you grow to your normal height. As she realized you were starting to grow, Blondie dropped you. The fall didn't hurt much, considering that you were already at about half your original height. When you reached your complete height of 5ft 9, you just wordlessly slapped her over the face and went back to Rebecca, where you shrank yourself back down to 3 inches and went back to being inanimate. Rebecca, almost equally perplexed as the blonde or her father, picked you up and put you back on her table.
"It's quite the special, magical doll. Whenever it senses me or itself in danger, it comes to life and grows to a normal height, where ot will do anything to defend us from said danger. That's why I always have it around. Now would you please be so kind to leave us alone?" "Yeah... Sure.", came the stuttered answer of the rich mans daughter. Astonishingly, nobody else noticed this argument, so you luckily didn't cause a commotion.
A few minutes later when the blonde eventually lost interest in you, Rebecca leaned down and asked you quietly, just how you did that.
You answered:
1112112122.title: Rebecca does not accept

choices: Rebecca turns her head to the window to look outside, causing you to fall.
Rebecca decides to ask you some questions, trying to figure out your situation.
111212.content:
Rebecca obviously wants you to be safe during this flight, and at 3 inches tall, it is possible that if Rebecca loses sight of you, a passing stewardess cart or someone walking the aisle to use the restroom can become dangerous. So, you suggest to Rebecca, "Place me in your ear." She looks a bit confused and promptly asks, "Why?"

Knowing that you already have a gentle giantess as company, and she also wants you to be safe, you explain that you don't want to cause a commotion on the flight--it's bad enough to become news on an airplane--think about it, what if there were Snakes on a Plane (to quote a movie film).

Rebecca realizes you are trying to maintain control and attention, so she brings her hand up to her ear. It is perfectly shaped with a hoop earring dangling from it. Slowly, you step into her earlobe and lean back as if you are on a hammock. Then you hear Rebecca speak to you:

"When the stewardess comes, I'm going to order a Diet Coke--do you want anything?" she asks you sweetly. You are amazed at how kind she is, and speak into her ear, "Yes, I'll share your drink with you--what sip will fill me up at this size," you say, while smiling. She laughs a bit because your voice is tickling her eardrums.

The plane begins to take off, and you have to hold on a bit because of the heavy (compared to your size) vibrations of the plane. Knowing you'll be here for awhile, you decide to relax...until...
111212.title: Your In-flight movie is: "In Her Ear"

choices: Yes, she takes you out of the purse
No, she leaves you in the purse
11122.content: Does she take you out of the purse, before putting it away?
11122.title: ...puts the purse overhead-It'll be a LONG ...

choices: Go for a pocket
Settle for the main area
112.content:
The briefcase is open, lying at the businesswoman's feet. You spotted her place it there after she'd retrieved her muffin from within. She should be engaged for long enough for you to secrete yourself inside, and then you'll be aboard and away!

You pass by behind her casually placed foot, which idly moves up and down irreguarly - were you to be too close, it would be all to easy to fall beneath it and be crushed.

At your three-inch height, you are taller than the open base of the 'case, and so can peer inside with ease. You'll have to be quick about this, as there's no telling when the giantess may spy you and snatch you up, ruining any hope you had of getting a free flight.

The briefcase is full of documents, and you don't waste any time trying to read the massive print. Instead, your eyes are already scanning for possible hiding places.

Numerous pockets dot the distant surface of the 'lid', suspended at right angles to the floor. It would be an effort to climb up that far, but once within the black fabric you'd be impossible to spot, as well as nice and secure.

Option two is to snuggle up among the documents. They seem to be secured in place by a velcro strap, but there's no guarantee that they wouldn't rock around in transit to harm you. Also, it's more likely that you'd be spotted by your host. On the plus side, it does away with the need to walk in plan sight to the other hiding place.

You cast one glance over your shoulder at the tower of the goddess' leg before coming to a decision.
112.title: Strictly Business

choices: The suitcase is left untouched during the flight
The woman opens her briefcase during the flight
A thief steals the briefcase before the woman boards the flight
1122.content:
It's just a little bit of paper. How could it possibly hurt you? Granted, it's enough paper to be fully composed from several whole redwoods, but there's no reason why that should put a crimp on your day.

You hoist yourself up and jump down into the space recently vacated by the muffin. There are even a few scattered crumbs left lying in its place, which you hurridly scarf down in an effort to appease your hunger. They're dry, but filling. Very filling.

Your prayers are answered when the woman doesn't look down at your hiding place before closing the lid, sealing you in darkness with an ominous click. Then the case is picked up, the world shifts ninety-degrees, and motion begins.

The papers are indeed held in place by the velcro strap, but you are not, bouncing against them with every step that your captress takes. Savage paper cuts slash at your arms and you bite down hard to prevent yourself from screaming. It's only a little of this that you have to put up with...
1122.title: Within the Briefcase

choices: China
Japan
11221.content:
You think you lucked out as she gits of the plane in flarda. But then the casce stops its too soon to be at a hoten shes still in the airport why she stoped you wonder. Then you hear the air port speeker. "Now Bording! Aisan internation, Concord flight 207. Now Bording." Then the casce moves again apearntly her trip to flarda was just a conecting flight for cheep flight to aisa!




Where in aisa?
11221.title: The suitcase is left untouched during the flight

choices: 5 star louxrey hoten room.
exspensive restouront in a privet booth.
112211.content: You land hours latter and hear chinese acsents or speach over a airport pa. Then you her and mand say "Bisness or pleasuer?" your hostess ansers. "Bisness!" then the man repled... "Wellcome to China please enjoy your stay and i hope you bisness hear is profitabule for both you and our cuntry mam." your hos says "thank you" and the case moves again. Soon the case is opened your in a ___________
112211.title: China

choices: Bring her palm down for you to climb into
Close her briefcase and then re-open it to make sure she isn't seeing a tiny man
11222.content:
Being inside of the briefcase isn't too bad...the smell of leather, the risk of getting a paper cut from the edge of one of the packers held in place (well it might leave a big gash), and then you have the collection of stamps (the woman must be planning to mail some documents at a local post office at some point).

You feel the briefcase being lifted again; the woman is sitting in her seat, wanting to make sure the contents didn't get shifted in the compartment when the plane was taking off.

She opens the briefcase and immediately sees you standing right next to the stamps. Not wanting to cause a scene, you offer some humor:

"You think you could mail me to Miami for Spring Break since you have this collection of stamps?"

The woman continues to stare in disbelief at your appearance...then she looks around to see if anyone else has spotted you--so far, no one is looking at the woman and the tiny you.

You begin motioning with your hand that you want to sit in her palm so she can cup her hands and prevent others from seeing.

She decides to...
11222.title: Very brief and to the point

choices: Continue on to the purse.
Go in the girl's bag.
12.content:
You nonchalantly move over by the bank of chairs the family is perched on, and hitting a few buttons on the bracelet, you activate the device. You feel the weird sinking feeling of the device activating. When you open your eyes, the world is once again enormous, and you quickly dash underneath the giant benches, and start heading for the family.

It's just a few moments later that you find yourself staring out at a pair of Spongebob Squarepants shoes suspended a few dozen feet off the ground--the shoes of the little girl. To her left, you see the keds of the teenager and the open purse that attracted you initially. You start toward it, then notice that there is another open pack--this one brightly colored and festooned with the Powerpuff Girls, and open just slightly. The little girl's pack.

You pause. You could continue on to the purse, but you might be better off stowing aboard with the kid.
12.title: Family Affair

choices: Now boarding flight
One last trip to the restroom
121.content:
The tiger-striped purse is festooned with badges for an eclectic selection of obscure bands, a perfect match for the slightly punk-ish apparel of the teenager between whose feet it lies. At an inch tall, you are more than a little apprehensive of getting so close to someone that could crush you beneath their heel without even realising.

Still, the thought of spring break flashes across your mind - it'll all be worth it, once you're there on the beach.

You venture boldly out beside the immense left shoe, impressed beyond words by its steadfast solidity. The rumbling of giants hurrying past on their way to catching flights echoes all around you, but this girl doesn't move a muscle, making her size seem all the scarier, somehow.

Swallowing back fear, you scamper to the purse, finding easy purchase on the many pin badges to scramble to its summit.

Seems such a long way down...

You peer into the darkened interior, but can glean no clue regarding what may be inside. The only way to find an answer would be to -

The bag suddenly lifts, and you topple headfirst into the purse. With a rolling jolt, you desperately attempt to right yourself as the outsized contents seem so intent upon crushing you. The entire room shakes and rattles, and the constant noise from outside causes the terrifying noises of the objects to create an altogether unpleasant experience.

Where can the giantess be going?
121.title: Off You Go

choices: You are found in the search
You go unnoticed
1211.content:
The journey is long and somewhat hazardous. The girl doesn't pay particular attention to keeping her bag from rocking around (it's almost as if she didn't know there is a one inch tall freeloader in her bag or something - oh, wait...), and so you have to avoid the mobile 'phone, make-up, tissues and other assorted knick-knacks that are tumbling around in here with you. In almost total pitch blackness, it's quite a task.

You take a buffeting, and are smarting with pain by the time things finally quiet down. Can this be it, already? No, this is carry-on luggage, so the staff'll want to check it at some point before boarding. This must be that time.
1211.title: Anything to Declare?

choices: The detector reacts further with the watch
The bag is opened by guards
12111.content:
B-DEEP.

Outside, you imagine one of the guards approaching the girl, asking her what she's hiding in her bag. Funny, you wouldn't have thought that your presence here would have been enough to set off a metal detector.

Unless the machine is reacting oddly to the watch. Or perhaps the girl has something else in here with you that is trigegring the alarm. If you just have a look around...
12111.title: The Machine Goes Off

choices: The guards are wondering why the power in the building has gone out
Everyone in the area - except the girl - has been shrunk to your size
121111.content:
You cut your investigation short as sparks begin to jump from your wristwatch, and it begins to become very hot. You tear it off and fling it to the ground, and not a moment too soon!

It explodes within the handbag, showering miniscule pieces of machinery around you. And with it is gone all hope you had of being restored to normal size.

Claustrophobia sets in. You scale the gigantic cellphone, tissue packets and make-up with a frenzied agility, squeezing yourself out the top of the bag and into great gulps of fresh air.

You're in the darkness of the metal detector, above the stationary conveyer. All hopes of getting to spring break must be cut short now, as your main concern should be getting back to the lab to fix this! That means getting someone's attention, and so you drop to the conveyer and walk out into the light.
121111.title: Interference

choices: Try to get the girl's attention, and her help
Try to get back to the lab without her help
1211112.content:
It takes you a moment to spot the girl, as she's not standing to her full, imposing height. No, she's crouched down, as if doing up her shoelace or something. Funny, where's everyone else?

Moving to the edge of the conveyer, it's only when you look down the amazing distance to the floor - and your mule - that you see what's happened. She's not bending down to tie her shoes, she's doing so to look at the tiny people scurrying about the floor at her feet.

The guards, other passengers both boarding and leaving - each is no bigger than an inch, perfectly scaled to your dimensions. Going through the metal detector must have interfered with your shrinking device!

What are you going to do now?
1211112.title: Lone Giantess

choices: Techno-investigation
Leader of the Borrowers
12111121.content:
You yell. You jump. You wave your arms. All to no avail. The giantess (well, she's regular-sized, but since everyone else is shrunk to an inch tall...) is far too occupied with watching the terrified populace of the airport scurrying away from her feet.

Almost lazily, she reaches out an arm to snag one person, squealing as her finger and thumb close around him/her. Then she rises to her full height, striding after the others as she stuffs one prisoner into a pocket.

So much for that plan. What now? SHould you fiddle with the device some more, hoping to reverse this situation, or instead try to get to the ground to help the tiny people yourself?
12111121.title: Snatch'd

choices: Act as bewildered as the others
Admit to being responsible
121111212.content:
You had no part in the design of the machine, and so have no hope of repairing it from scratch. However, you reckon you have a half-decent shot at rallying the other shrunken guys and gals to your cause. You aren't without charisma, and you have the bonus that you aren't disoriented by what just happened. Cheesed off, but not disoriented.

You wander to the edge of the luggage desk, looking down at the inch-tall multitude below. Of particular interest, you notice that the group of co-eds that you had considered tagging along with (probably a better idea,in retrospect) are huddled together, shaking with terror. Going to them,providing comfort and leadership, would certainly earn you a few favours with them...

You look around, to make sure that no regular-sized people are approaching, and then apply yourself to climbing down to ground level. It's a difficult process, and at several points you almost slip and fall, but you are nearly there when a man calls out to you,asking who you are. What you say now will determine how the rest of this will play out...
121111212.title: Leader of the Borrowers

choices: Abandon the infirm so the fit can try to run away
Keep everyone together as a group
Stay behind to confront the giantess yourself while the others run
1211112121.content:
"Who I am isn't important," you reply, as loudly and confidently as you can manage, adding a little swagger to your approach. "What is important is sticking together to survive this. Does anyone have a plan?"

The man who confronted you scratches the back of his head, while much of the rest of the crowd is absorbed in throwing up, rolling into a foetal position or trying to hide under pieces of paper. Allowing a moment to pass, you proceed to talk to your captive audience.

"We can't stay here. That girl could be back any minute, and the last thing we want is for her to find us. So, everyone pull yourselves together, and we can try to get to the exits! Come on people, quickly!"

They listen, the more able helping the shaking elderly to their feet, or chasing down a few stragglers. This might just work!

Then a vibration in the floor, accompanied by an echoing, repeated thud. Around the corner of the metal detector stalks the punk, crouching low as she scans the ground with his immense eyes.

No! She's back too soon! There isn't enough time! The people are looking for you to lead them, so how should you deal with this situation? Try to save as many as possible, or sacrifice a few for the greater good?
1211112121.title: Against the Giantess

choices: Leap to the mother; her purse is safer
Leave the girl and her family and choose someone else.
12112.content:
You are amazed as the purse goes through the detector unnoticed...especially your metal wristwatch that shrank you. Apparently, because of your small size, the machine didn't pick it up; however, you aren't enjoying the ride as the purse continues to sway and move around. The girl and her family are getting close to where they are to board the plane, and you begin to realize if you should change "flights" AKA leaping to the mother's purse. You did notice earlier that her purse is a big bigger, and there's a pocket on the outside (where's there's less items).

Here's the problem: the family is moving a bit fast...even though the mother and girl are close.

What can you do? Well, if you leap (with luck), you'll land on the wife's pink shirt and slide into the purse. Be careful with this option though, you are small and by the time you get near the wife, she'll be away and you'll fall to your death.

Option two is a little easier...leap out of the girl's purse onto her hip and climb down. Maybe this family isn't your ticket to spring break...perhaps someone else is.

What is your choice?
12112.title: Thank You for Flying with Us

choices: You've landed on one of the co-eds
You've landed on airport staff, closing the doors behind the last passenger
121121.content:
It's only as you finally clamber past the purse zips, to stand astride the rapidly wobbling accessory as it bumps against the girl's hip and look across a rapidly moving, giant landscape, that you realise what a crazy idea you've hatched.

You're an inch tall, the girl's mother is walking over two feet away at a speed not exactly matching that of your current carrier... Ah, the hell with it.

The jump takes you into mid-air,only to be abused by the air currents swept up by greater bodies than yours. The family passes on, your insect-like form tossed around in their wake, screaming its defiance even as it collides with an oncomer at midriff height - you cling tight, as this could be your last chance.
121121.title: Changing Trains

choices: Get the woman's attention.  Start by climbing her leg.
Go to the woman at Terminal B-107.  She might be changing flights.
1211212.content:
Making a jump wasn't as easy as you thought, but as least you have made some success in getting out of the purse and away from the family. Looks like things might be okay, until you stare at your new surroundings.

First of all, you are on a shiny black surface, second of all, this surface's pointed end (which is in the shape of a shoe's toe) is aiming at the terminal's doorway (which from your view point is now closing).

And thirdly...the airport is stretching far beyond where you are...BAD NEWS: you're not on the plane!

Apparently your jump was mistimed, causing you to be on one of the staff woman...to be more specific, you're on her high heel shoe. You need to come up with a plan B because she is about to walk away from the terminal door and make her way to the desk to get the next flight ready.

Well, here's your options:

(1) Maybe this woman can help you...there's got to be other flights to Miami...she could walk to the next terminal.

(2) Look around the neighboring terminals for a passenger that maybe, just maybe, will change their flight plan and go to Miami...it's possible that someone flying to Chicago might have to change their flight and go to Florida (for example). All you can do is try...and you better do something soon...because Spring Break's clock is ticking.

What do you do?
1211212.title: Welcome to Flight High Heel Shoe

choices: Stick with the stewardess
Switch transports yet again
12112121.content:
Easy. You may be an inch tall, but that leg isn't totally smooth. Plenty of handholds. You stride from the toe-end of the shoe toward the ankle, but that is when the woman takes a step, throwing you off completely. You reach out an arm to try and grab something as she passes, but all that earns you is a kick from her trailing leg.

The impact shatters your arm and sends you sprawling before the giant airport staff member, accomplishing your objective in an unexpected way: the extra momentum from her walk has powered you up to knee height, where your good arm sinks its fingers into the pores of her skin.

The agony is intense, as you dangle by one arm from an incredible height, as the wall to which you cling moves constantly, banging you against it and further jarring your secondary, shattered upper limb. All the aid you require from this woman now is for her to stop walking, just give you a moment's respite.

No, screw this; it was a fun plan, but it's time to get real. You're not going to Spring Break, and it would be madness to further risk your life in the interests of getting there. Time to activate the device and get going. You look to your wrist and despair.

In addition to breaking your arm, the woman's glancing blow also smashed the watch into pieces. Looks like you're stuck this size! Now there's a desperate need to get this woman's attention!

Of course, hanging on here until she stops will be unbearable. Perhaps you should try hopping off the next time she passes a baggage hill, and get help elsewhere?AC
12112121.title: I See You

choices: Go to the woman changing flights (the low heel girl)
Head for the impatient woman; maybe if she sees you, her attitude will change.
12112122.content:
Lucky for you, Terminal B-107 isn't far from where you are...well at your height it is. Nevertheless, you are now at a new terminal, back to "Square One"


Spring Break needs to start with you soon, and finding a new lift on a passenger is your best option. You don't want to try a stewardess because the shoe you were just on...wasn't occupied to a friendly stewardess (although she was smiling).

So, you look around the terminal carefully. Then you notice her:

A woman wearing a blue blouse, gray dress pants, and black low heel pumps is sitting in one of the chairs looking at her cellphone. Judging by the look on her face, it looks like she is changing flights! (Well, you aren't 100% positive, but it is the first woman you've spotted).

There is also some good news: the shoes she is wearing aren't high enough, so hitching a ride on them should be easy.

Then, you notice another woman, and this one has the shoes perfect to hitch a ride. This woman is a bit older, wearing a white blouse, blue skirt, and ankle strap heels. The heels aren't that high, but the strap is close for you to hold and go with her on the flight.

So which lady will it be: Of the two, the low heel one is keeping her feet still; the other one keeps tapping her shoe impatiently.
12112122.title: Terminal B-107; Who to board?

choices: Move into the open to get her attention
Hide behind the eye-liner
1212.content:
Eventually the rumbling walk subsides, and you right yourself just in time to see immense fingers - each with a different colour nail polish - part the sky.

Soon a face dominates the opening of the bag, the face of the teenage girl to whom it belongs. She has clearly applied too much eyeliner you notice as one of her hands swoops back to brush a strand of multi-coloured hair away, and the lips - between which are rather scary-looking teeth - are contrasting shades of purple.

The eyes dart around, searching through the confines of your dark prison for something, and you must decide on whether you want her to spot you.
1212.title: Punk'd

choices: Let her pick you up
Try to avoid being pinched
12121.content:
You step proudly into sight, waving your arms up at the tremendous punk girl whose handbag you're riding in. Her gargantuan face rushes through shock and awe and straight into wonder, the edges of her mouth curling up ever-so-slightly into a smile as she looks, open-mouthed, in your direction.

She makes no sound as her fingers move toward you, clearly prepared to pick you up between finger and thumb, pressed between a force whose effect on your shrunken body you're not sure of. It could be fine, or it could be enough to kill you...
12121.title: Physics

choices: Stay with her... for now
Try and scramble out of the bag
121212.content:
You jump back from where you were standing, running behind the girl's truck-trailer-plus sized mobile phone. Her hand thumps to the ground in frustration at missing you, and you are pitched from your feet at the resulting quake.

"Hey!" she says. "There's no need to be afraid, little guy! I'm not going to hurt you!"

You get to your feet and look up to see that she's not angry with you. In fact, she's smiling even more than she was before.

"It's not as if you can run away anyway, is it?" she giggles, closing her bag around you and plunging you into darkness! Then the feeling of weightlessness comes again as it is hoisted onto her shoulder, and she begins to walk.

Knowing that she knows of you, should you stay here, for your free trip? Or is it too dangerous, being one-inch tall in the hands of this teenager?
121212.title: Futile

choices: You're in the airplane's lavatory.
You're in the bathroom at the hotel -- they've long since arrived.
1212121.content:
Well, honestly, where are you going to go? The purse sways back and forth, sometimes gently and sometimes with frightening velocity, but it seems relatively safe. And while you weren't expecting to be in the care of a teenaged punk, she at least seems to be more bemused by you than anything else.

No, in some ways, this makes things easier. She'll carry you on the plane, keep you safe through your destination...yeah, this is okay, you think.

The purse sways gently, and you lean back, resting your head against a wad of kleenex. Before you know it, you're drifting off to sleep.

Suddenly, a tearing noise awakens you. You shield your eyes from the light, and look up into the mammoth face of the girl, who's staring down at you. "Wakey wakey, little guy!" she says, smirking.

You look up and see a mirror far above. You're in a bathroom. But where?
1212121.title: Stay the Course

choices: Climb the girl's hand
Run away, fast!
12121211.content:
"Feeling more talkative, now?" she says. "I'm bored, what with this long airflight an' all, and I could use some entertainment. What do you say?"

Looks like she's offering you a second chance to come willingly, her hand this time lowering slowly and carefully - maybe she's trying not to startle you - to rest palm-upwards alongside you, an elevated pavilion of flesh.

Should you go with her? She may get angry if you don't. Then again, who knows what she wants to do in order to 'entertain' herself? perhaps you should take this opportunity to skip out. After all, step one of getting aboard the 'plane has been accomplished, sp maybe you can evade this giantess and find somewhere else to shelter until arrival?
12121211.title: Airborne

choices: Tell her the truth.
Lie.
121212111.content:
For half a second, you consider darting away, but...well, why? The girl may be a little young for you (though just a little), but she seems fairly nice and calm, and frankly...you're not sure that anything she could be thinking of could be less entertaining than hanging out in her purse.

So giving in to temptation, you clamber through the folderal and pull yourself up onto the fleshy plain of her pale pink hand.

It's actually a bit trickier than you expected. She's giving you as much of a palm as she can, but really, her hand is cupped in order for it to fit into the purse. And so you stumble over her fingers, while up above, you hear a giggle.

You look over your shoulder, and she smiles down at you. "Sorry," she says, "but you've gotta admit, it's a little funny."

You chuckle, and smile back; it is a bit strange, your stumbling over the fingers of a teenaged girl. You kneel down by her middle finger, admiring an immense silver ring featuring a celtic knot. It's interesting. You wonder....

But further thoughts are foresaken as your stomach drops away, and the girl lifts you effortlessly to eye level. You spin around, and can't help but skitter slightly backwards as her enormous, black-lined eyes train on you.

"Don't be scared," she says. "I'm not going to hurt you. My name's Caitlyn. I'm hoping we can be friends."

You relax -- a little -- although you're still not entirely sure about this.

"So," she says, "how did you get so small?
121212111.title: Climb the girl's hand

choices: She IS impressed with you stickin' it to the man!
Bad luck - you found the only punk with a social conscience
1212121111.content: You explain your ingenious plan to Caitlin, and watch for reaction on her massive face. She'll be so impressed with your cleverness, you bet!
1212121111.title: Truth

choices: Scare Caitlyn's mother while she sleeps
Discipline Caitlyn's younger siblings
12121211111.content:
"That's pretty darin'," Caitlin says, nodding her head approvingly. "And you chose me to hang with during the trip? I'm honoured."

Yeah, why not? Let's go with that...

"Anyway, you must be pretty bored at the moment," she says. "I have to put up with my bratty little brother and sister - my parents expect me to take care of 'em while they sleep their lazy asses away a few seats away. It's driving me nuts."

Then Caitlyn looks both ways before continuing, as if afraid of someone overhearing. "Hey, you wanna help me, little guy? Bet you could give my mom a fright and wake her up! It'd be funny as Hell! That'd teach her for giving me responsibilities."

You're mulling the possibility over when she blurts something out again, knocking you over in her palm. "No! I've got a better idea! I can use you to scare those two kids into submission, get 'em to stay quiet for the trip!"

You don't know. Sounds dangerous...

"Aw, I can see that you're not convinced, little guy. Well, I will be very grateful afterwards..." Caitlyn purrs, brushing her soft, warm lips over your head and bringing them together for a brief, blindingly powerful kiss before pulling away, leaving you utterly in her thrall.

Which of her ideas will you agree to?
12121211111.title: Good Impression

choices: Caitlyn puts you on her mother's feet
You are dropped onto Caitlyn's mother's head
121212111111.content:
"Awesome!" Caitlyn gushes, smile once more eating up the sky. "This is gonna be soooo cool!"

Her other hand snatches up the purse again, while you are wrapped up within the warm, only slightly stifling confines of Caitlyn's fist, held secure, safe and hidden. Flesh pulses all around you, and comfort isn't far from your mind. The world shakes all about as your giantess friend (you hope) walks, but you are cushioned against all buffets and bashes by her tremendous musculature, and you begin to relax.

All too soon, you are deposited at your destination...
121212111111.title: Mother Bound

choices: Get with the program, and enact Caitlyn's plan
Screw Caitlyn - you're just gonna relax here, on her mother's foot
1212121111111.content:
The hand opens, funneling to roll you down the slightly sweaty mass of skin to a similar surface beneath. You look upwards, to give Caitlyn a thumbs-up signal of safe arrival, but the giantess is departing already with a haste that stuns you - something so vast, moving with such speed...

Caitlyn's tremendous legs - clad in striped stockings - take her out of your view faster than you hoped, leaving you alone, on the foot of her mother.

Looking around, you see that the skin is nicely tanned, terminating in a selection of gragantuan yet shapely toes, their shoe prison lying off to one side like a trainwreck while the woman lets her feet breathe and relax on this long 'plane flight.

Turning in the opposite direction, the ankles are soon eclipsed by denim, a seemingly endless trail of jeans that leads upwards somewhere, to a far distant knee that stands as a penthouse far beyond your lowly means.

Caitlyn wanted you to spook this giantess by scurrying about her feet and waking her up, but now that you're here you're not sure that that is such a good idea. The woman is even bigger than the teen punk was (obviously), and consequently so much stronger and more powerful. Even one of those toes could smash the life from you with but a single movement - do you really want to wake the woman up and be thought of as a bug to be crushed? It may be endlessly amusing to Caitlyn, but would prove quickly fatal to you.

But Caitlyn wouldn't be abandoning you, would she? She must have planned something, to rescue you seconds before the end? Or does she not care for you at all, seeing you as nothing but a toy to annoy her mother with, to be discarded when its time is done? Perhaps you should rebel against her, and merely sit - still and content - upon her mother's foot until the flight is over? It looks to be a relatively safe place, and none of the other people (or feet, as far as you can see them) sitting in this row seem particularly restless either.

Truth be told, the warm flesh beneath you is reminiscent of the tender embrace of Caitlyn's fist - this truly wouldn't be a bad place to sit out the trip to Spring Break...
1212121111111.title: Mother's Feet

choices: You move down to tickle the toes
You move up to scratch at the leg
12121211111111.content:
Okay. It's okay. You're an inch tall, standing on the bare foot of a sleeping woman whom you've been urged to awaken by her daughter. There's no danger here.

You begin running back and forth across the expanse of the top of the foot, the warm skin beneath you not giving at all beneath your miniscule weight. But hopefully she can still feel some of your movement, and then Caitlyn's fun can begin...

You see the toes flex in annoyance. Just once. But clearly it's a sign that you're being noticed. You'll just have to achieve a little more if you want the woman to wake fully.
12121211111111.title: Just the Beginning

choices: Stay where you are - she won't look down
Jump off - she won't step on you
121212111111111.content:
The woman's big toe has greater mass than you - you couldn't put your arms around it. But you can get your hands and fingers in there, in the wrinkles of the skin above the joint, and tickle it for all you're worth. The skin is tougher than Caitlyn's palm, but you're sure that you're making progress. The woman, asleep as she is, must be experiencing some shift in her dreams right now!

A shadow falls across you, and you barely move aside in time to avoid being smushed beneath the writhing toes of the other foot, come to end your itch. Must be an unconscious reaction, but you can't help but watch the hypnotic movements as the toe works back and forth, its vast muscles enough to crush you easily. This new size allows you to properly appreciate the magnificent workmanship that is the human body. Such a harmless act to the woman, yet to you it is the most awesome and dangerous scene you have ever witnessed.

The feet both rise from the carpet, and you drop prone to hold yourself steady. Looking to one side, the toes are stretching out. She must be waking!
