You step a little bit closer to the woman and tap her index finger; this causes her to look down--with a surprised and curious look on her face.

"What? What in the world?" she asks herself and shifts her weight a bit in the grass--you are worried that she is about to stand up, so you quickly respond:

"Wait, please don't move!" you call up to the woman (you obviously don't want her to get up because the watch might fall into the grass or worse get stepped on by her heel without notice).

Thankfully the woman keeps still, then listens to your request:

"Listen, I know this is already surprising enough as is--a tiny person talking to you here in the park--but there is something that I need to get that might have landed on either your skirt, blouse, or it might be on the toe of one of your heels. I was wondering if you could help me find it."

The woman responds, with confusion in her tone: "What is it that you need to get?" She also scans her clothes as well to make sure you aren't making this up.

"Well--it's a watch that...my grandfather gave me (you had to think of something right off the top of your head)" You continue, "Let me sit in your palm and I'll look for the watch; besides, since I'm small, I can see it better."

The woman decides to:

You're not even at the elbow before she speaks again: "Well, looks like we'll have to -" Stopping short, she must have noticed that you've departed her palm, and bends over to look at her feet. She sweeps her arm up to brush hair from her eyes, and this naturally bends in the middle, the forearm where you struggle rushing to meet the bulging bicep of this teenager.

You are squeezed, feeling like you're going to pop or snap under the pressure of a girl's simple movement, and again you think that smuggling yourself aboard a 'plane at an inch height wasn't your greatest idea and maybe you should've lived a better life, given more to charity, told your parents you loved them -

The pressure relieves suddenly, and your grip has already been released. Caitlyn's arm straightens and you fall, arms flailing uselessly, thoughts of using the watch far from your mind as you plunge, looking down the looming length of the punk's leg, that floor so decidedly fatal-looking.

You could scream, beg for help and forgiveness and hope that Caitlyn doesn't hurt you any more than she inadvertently managed. But should you give up so easily? TO quit now would render all that pain, all those doubtless broken bones pointless. With quick reactions, you should be able to grab ahold of one of Caitlyn's many hanging chains or zippers, perhaps wrenching arms from sockets but at least arresting descent? Use that adrenaline, man!
121212122122.title: Run Up The Giantess' Arm

choices: "Now about that foot massage..."
Caitlyn leaves the bathroom with you.
1212121221221.content:
An instinctive cry for help escapes your lips as you plummet to an almost certain death. Your tiny cry somehow manages to catch the attention of the teenaged girl, who sees you falling by her leg. She quickly raises her leg under you, creating a slant. You hit the fabric of her pants and start to tumble down the length of Caitlyn's leg. Each tunble was mildy painful, but at least it was slowin your velocity a bit. As you made your way down her leg, you rolled onto the fabric of her sock. You briefly noticed a thick, cheesey aroma as you rolled over her ankle, and plopped down on the floor next to her foot.
Raising a hand to your aching head, you noticed something sparking. The watch was busted! "Gad damnit, how could this get any worse?" You mumbled as a shadow hovered over you. Her socked foot loomed over your body, and her toes wiggled as they pushed down on you, covering you in rank foot odor. "Friends don't run away from each other," she said, "you tried to get away from me! And almost died. So now we'll try things my way, and you'll have a nice, safe summer with me."
1212121221221.title: Cry for help

choices: Caitlyn ignores Kelly, and takes the massage to its conclusion
Caitlyn picks you up, opens the door and goes elsewhere
Caitlyn opens the door, but keeps you gripped in her toes
12121212212211.content:
This officially stopped being funny about a minute ago. Then, it didn't matter how crazy things got, what this girl said, because at any moment you could send the madness with a quick blast of the watch.

Now, things are deadly serious. With you trapped at an inch tall, this behemoth teenager is fully in charge, more than capable of annihilating your pathetic form at her merest whim. You are barely able to wriggle beneath the weight of her sock-clad toe alone, and with the stench you want to get as far away as possible.

The mas above you shifts, relenting, yet you remain trapped, the thick fibres of the sock resisting all attempts to move yourself out from under it. A second later, it is dashed aside, as Caitlyn's now-bare foot kicks the empty sock away. To you, an insurmountable obstacle, to her, a mere annoyance.

"Now, about that foot massage..." she booms from above, and before you have time to relish your release from pressure and stench, her bare toe gently alights on top of you, its rough surface, savage heat and intense odour all suffusing your mind.

There is nothing beyond the toe now, it is all that you can hope to experience for the rest of your life! Caitlyn could crush you at any time! In hopeless prayer, you attempt to scratch away at the thick, ridge skin with every motion of your tiny body. Can she even feel your movements? How much effort would you need to give for her to even notice a 'massage'?

Sound can barely get to you beneath your muscled prison, its beating blood pulsing away, but even you can register the savage pounding of Kelly on the bathroom door. Your one hope for salvation, that Caitlyn may get annoyed by it and change the circumstances...
12121212212211.title: The Foot Is the World

choices: Ask Caitlyn for help
Allow Caitlyn to see your subserviance
12121212212212.content:
That's it, then. The device is shorted out, with no way of being repaired at this size, and your inch-tall form is covered in injuries, clinging to life through a thick veil of pain her under this socked foot. Any cockiness or power you may have possessed is fled, and you're wholly beholden to this gargantuan, to this god, to this -

No. As pathetic as you are, this is no giantess at whose mercy you lie. She's just a girl, and you've brought yourself down to a level where a simple motion of her toe could crush you to death. You'll have to obey her whims. If you can stick with her, survive this whole Spring Break and return flight, perhaps you might be able to get her to take you to Professor Martin. The guy invented the device; he can make another. You just have to survive this holiday, and stay in this irresponsible punk's good books...

Hunkering down over you, Caitlyn - or maybe you should get used to calling her K? - tuts, and reaches for you with her immense fingers. "Still, you were a little right. There's not enough room her for big ol' me, so maybe we should let Kelly in and go somewhere else for a bit of fun, eh?"

There is a moment where her foot is off you, and if you weren't so riddle with internal injuries you could've made a run for it. Instead, you lie there like a chump as her fingers scoop you up, and her other hand rolls up her trouser leg.

"Can't trust you anywhere high though, champ. Try not to fall from here, wouldya?"

She peels back the exposed top of her sock, allowing an even stronger stench to issue forth. She doesn't drop you down into it however, instead letting the elastic of its edge pin you in place, your head and shoulders free of the clammy darkness. You would struggle, but your miniscule strength is no match for this simple garment! Still, the pressure does keep you secure, and as the girl rises to her full height and takes a thundering step, you are hardly jarred against her mighty muscles at all.

The click of the door opening, K's shout to her sister: "'Sall yours, Snotbag!", her paces out of the bathroom toward her bed - it all passes in a blur while you prepare yourself for your new life during this week. What happens next, what this goddess deigns to do with you, is beyond your control. But how you react to it still matters. Your injuries are the most pressing matter at the moment, so maybe you should impress upon her how urgent it is that you get medical attention? Or, since you've been so rude to her already, maybe you should get it clear to her that you're willing to do whatever she wants before you start asking for help?
12121212212212.title: Dominated

choices: Blame yourself, there's nothing wrong with Caitlyn!
Call Caitlyn out on her lack of care for you
121212122122121.content:
Light blinds you for a second as Caitlyn rolls up her trouser leg again, and then your eyes make out the scene: a massive hotel bedroom, dominated by three beds. Further details are impossible to make out as you are snatched up between fingers again, the pressure opening the gates of your pain once more.

Perhaps she sees the pained expression on your face as she drops you into a palm and brings you before her own, curious visage. This is your chance.

"Please, Caitlyn," you gasp, as loudly as you can manage, "I'm really hurt. Can you help..?"

"You're hurt?" she gasps, sucking away your oxygen. "Is that because you tried to run away from me, and got yourself hurt? What about me, my emotional pain? What must you think of me, that you try to abandon me so quickly? What's wrong with me?"

Is she waiting for an answer? That massive face is focused entirely upon you, and you need to respond. Careful now, she's an emotional teenage girl!
121212122122121.title: All Out Of Mercy

choices: Stick with Caitlyn to the bitter end
Try to get across to Caitlyn's parents
Abandon the family when the chance becomes available
1212121221221211.content:
"Hey, hey," you choke out, "it's not you... K. I'd be scared of anyone at this size! I'm... sorry if I hurt your feelings."

That's right, swallow back your anger and pain, before you bring a whole world of hurt down upon yourself! The effect is immediately apparent, the face that dominates your view softening, the pitted shadows of frown-lines smoothing away as Caitlyn relaxes.

"I accept your apology," she rumbles. "Now, promise not to run off again, alright? I worry for you."

Of course you make the promise, but whether you intend to keep it is up to you. As Caitlyn goes through the itinerary of her family - once everyone's freshened up, they'll head to a restaurant for their first meal - you go over the pros and cons.

The girl is temperamental. While she seems to care for you, her swinging moods could result in her absently hurting or killing you.

Wouldn't her mother or father be a better person to contact? Such a mature person would be a much better prospect for caring for you on this trip, and taking you back to the professor once the journey's over. You could attempt to get to one of them during the meal, but who knows how their initial reaction might be?

The third choice would be to abandon this family entirely, and take a chance on some random stranger being far more beneficial!
1212121221221211.title: Tell Her What She Wants to Hear

choices: Ask Caitlyn to put you back in her bag
Beg Caitlyn to hide you anywhere BUT that damned bag
Persuade Caitlyn to run off somewhere outside
12121212212212111.content:
Yeah, she may not be perfect, but Caitlyn's the only friend you have right now. Nodding to yourself at your resolution, you look up from the palm beneath your feet to the giant face, seeing that her immense eyes are widened, as if waiting for a response.

Oops.

"Sorry, what?"

"God, you weren't even listening! Typical! No-one understands my problems, doesn't care about what I want. They just drag me along with them where they want to go, no matter what I want."

Gee, I don't know that feeling, you think to yourself.

"I thought you'd be different. Grateful, maybe?"

As she lifts you ever closer to her face, you lick your lips, thinking desperately for a response.

"Thanks, K. For everything. I... I know I'm being a great burden to you, with all that you've already got going on..."

An eyebrow rises up on that mountain slope, in time with a wry widening of one side of that crushing mouth. "Sure. Well, Kelly will be outta the bathroom soon, and it'll be up to me to keep her entertained until the folks feel like they wanna care for their fuckin' kids. We're gonna have to hie you away for a while, buddy. Sorry."

Time to speak up, make a suggestion..!
12121212212212111.title: Self-Centred

choices: Caitlyn shows you to Kelly
Caitlyn quickly closes her hand around you
Caitlyn places you in hiding in the room
121212122122121112.content:
"Not the bag, please."

"Oh?" Caitlyn spreads the other side of her mouth wide in a big grin as she lifts you higher again. "What, I don't get a say in this? I have to look after Kelly and now you as well, as if I don't want to be off at Spring Break myself!"

Enough with the pity party. "Really? You're the one asking for sympathy? Look at me! You're not even old enough to drink, and you're holding me in the palm of your hand!"

The smile falls. "How old do you think I am?"

You stumble as you ponder the answer, wondering what she could be getting at. Teenage girls all look the same in their rebellious phase, and under all that shapeless clothing she could be anywhere from thirteen to sixtee-

"I'm twenty-one, asshole."

What? Really? How could you have been so off? Was it just an assumption, from seeing her alongside two young kids with two adults? You stumble not only from the revelation, but as the woman brings her hand further from her face again, allowing more of her immense body to be in view. And as you crawl upright again, you can look up the sheer wall of her body as her free hand clamps to her breast.

"Don't let these little girls fool you," she says, and you think better of pointing out that even her meagre tits are humungous to someone of your inch-high size. "I'm just short for my age, that's all. Just like you, I'd rather be anywhere but here."

"Abandoning your brother and sister?" you challenge.

You're shaken again as Caitlyn brings you upward in a rush, and almost screams in your face, teeth clashing, spittle flying. "They're not related to me! They're Ralph's kids, and I hate that Mom married him."

Wow, that was pretty clunky exposition. But now that you have a betetr idea of where you stand here - as you stand up again on her thick skin - you can make a more reasoned argument.

"Dad hates it when you call him that," another voice intrudes. "I'm gonna tell."

Kelly has entered the room, and here you are, in the open, standing plainly in Caitlyn's hand! What will she do?
121212122122121112.title: Call For a Reprieve

choices: Caitlyn heads to a bar
Caitlyn heads for the beach
Caitlyn tries chatting up a man
Caitlyn tries chatting up a woman
Caitlyn (GASPS!) tries to help the tiny man on her shoulder
1212121221221211121.content:
The flesh platform upon which you stand is thrust forward, and my eyes meet those of the gigantic, terrifying young girl that Caitlyn calls Kelly. That brutish young face squints in confusion for a moment before your guardian brings you back in close.

"Yeah, see this little guy? He's mine. And I'll be heading off into town to have a little fun with him. You hang tight until Mom or Ralph get back, yeah? Feel free to tell them about my buddy here: not like they'll believe you!"

Kelly raises a protest, but Caitlyn has already slipped her shoes on and marched outside. She brings her hand up again, allowing you to scamper across to her shoulder and hold fast as she strides purposefully onward. Up here, you can almost forget the fact that you're shrunk to an inch tall as the outsize world passes by at a reasonable height. You may have trapped yourself in a land of giants, but with one looking out for you, maybe this won't be so bad?

"I gotta thank you," Caitlyn says. "With you around, I'm no longer the most pathetic person I know. Pretty empowering, really, having a little guy like you around. No need to hide my true self anymore, the world is my oyster and all that! Hmm, where to take me and my new self-confidence..?"
1212121221221211121.title: The Empowering Freedom of Greater Size

choices: Climb atop the table to meet with Caitlyn's parents
Climb to the ground to approach the parents that way
Get down from the chair and explore elsewhere in the restaurant
12121212212212112.content:
"Can I come to the meal with you?" you ask. "I haven't eaten for hours."

"You ask that as if I wasn't taking you everywhere I go," Caitlyn smiles, and your heart sinks. Yes, you'll definitely have to get away from her as soon as possible.

You are placed on a bedside table while the girl gets her shoes on, and shrugs on a jacket. There's no chance to run, not only because your captor's eyes only leave you briefly but because your injuries still ache. You take the time to gingerly feel at your bruises, and conclude that's there's no serious broken bones or internal bleeding. You're no medical doctor though, so take that as you will.

"Ready in there?" comes a shout, and Caitlyn springs to her feet with thunder, her hand snatching you up too quickly for you to even feel the impact immediately. As you are stuffed into a jacket pocket, the shock catches up with you, and you gasp repeatedly as Caitlyn shouts her answer to her mother.

You roll around in the soft darkness as the girl walks, but it's the most comfort you've had since you got into her bag back at the airport. When the thought finally gets to you to get a grip, you support yourself well enough to make it close to enjoyable.

Close.

The ride comes to an end as Caitlyn sits, and then removes the jacket. You look to the cavernous entrance to see that the coat has been laid over the back on her chair, and it would be but a short climb to get to the arm of the chair.

You restrain the urge for the moment, as the gargantuan teenager dominates your view, shifting uneasily with movements that could prove even more deadly than the brief crushing you received in her elbow joint.

So you bide your time, looking up as she fills up on glass after glass of water as the family waits for their meal to arrive in the restaurant. In time, she rises to go to the restroom, and you look back on the last time she was near the toilet - she really should have gone then, before they left!

Her shadow passes over you, and now is your chance to escape from her 'care' and find new assistance. The family is right here - you can hear the burble of their conversation loudly enough - but since you're in a restaurant, you could always go exploring and find some other likely prospect, to distance yourself away from Caitlyn all the more...
12121212212212112.title: A Family Meal

choices: Head for the mother, past her son
Head for the father, past his daughter
Strike for the nearest target, the village of sauce bottles and jugs
121212122122121121.content:
Yeah, it's a simple climb across the thick material of Caitlyn's denim jacket to get to the chair arm, and from there a run up allows you to grasp the tablecloth and pull yourself up to witness the massive forms of the family eating.

You are aghast at the vast quantities of food that each of the monsters packs away, hands and cutlery hefting truckloads toward mouths that hungrily smash their way through with cacophonous terror. In time you lower your gaze and take calming breaths, telling yourself that you have to find an ally quickly, before the girl gets back from her bathroom break.

So you loom to your left and to your right, seeing respectively her brother and sister, both creatures you want to avoid. Beyond them are the even bigger, incalculably powerful forms of the matriarch and patriarch, mature gods whose aid would be greatly appreciated now you're stuck at one inch tall.

Besides the plates of food that the family are eating from, the centre of this vast plain hosts a collection of condiments and communal drink - building-big in a way that would perfect cover from the eyes of those around you, but a risky diversion given the time frame you're in.

Pausing only to snatch a handful of Caitlyn's potato mash and munch on it, you decide upon your course.
121212122122121121.title: The Food of the Gods

choices: Rest in Clive's pocket
Climb to the restaurant floor
Ascend Clive to get his help
1212121221221211211.content:
You run across the firm surface of the tablecloth, your eyes intent on the looming mountain of Caitlyn's mother. You can see the resemblance, a mature face into which the girl you know will grow. The smiling, casual banter she shares with her husband shows a more easy-going, loving personality than her daughter, and she plucks at her meal as delicately as it is possible for a living skyscraper to do.

Reverie is squeezed from your body along with breath as a finger and thumb constrict like a car-crusher, and you are lifted from your feet by the astronomical strength of a young boy. Yours yells of pain and protest are accompanied by your fists pounding on the unyielding surface of his skin, and you roll your eyes skyward to see his smiling face, oblivious to the agony he's inflicting.

Then you are lowered to the tabletop again, with incredible force that shocks through your ankles. He raises and lowers you again and again, moving you incrementally forward as he rapidly mashes your feet into the table. With a clarity born of agony, you realise that he's simulating walking with your inch-tall self, just like you were a -

"Clive!" A woman's powerful voice. "I told you, no toys at the table!"

The boy lifts you up and away, a blur of motion stuffing you into his back pocket. You are left there alone with your pain again and take stock of your situation.

Your body can't take much more of this! But to rest here would be to give up, and resign yourself to life as a toy. A brief, violent life.

You could easily climb free of this loose pocket, and from there descend to the floor, to get as far away from this mad family as possible.

Or, if you still cling to a shred of hope, you could instead climb upwards, up the heights of this boy's torso, to his shoulder and then ear. If you could talk with him, you could convince him to help you get on that return flight. Why, if ET has taught you anything, it's that young boys are eager to help strange, powerless friends...
1212121221221211211.title: Head for the mother, past her son

12121212212212112112.content:
You've had enough of this family and the constant torture you've suffered at their hands. You pull yourself free from beneath the boy, sliding out of his pocket and quickly descending the rough leg of his chair.

Okay, okay, this can still work. You're free now, free from Caitlyn. The aisle is a bit vast, but once you're across it there's an empty table you can hide beneath and try to collect your thoughts. You break into a Sprint, running at full tilt across the empty space, ignoring the vauge rumble of life in the outside world.

Boom, boom, boom!

You freeze. Back from the bathroom and headed this way came Caitlyn. Quickly you drop flat, fearful that if she finds you now that you won't survive your punishment.

You needed have worried. Her eyes were locked firmly on her jacket, with a nearly feral hunger in them. She wasn't looking down, and didn't have a chance to spot you.

But this blessing quickly turned. You've seen these giants move, seen just how much ground they can cover, yet it still came as a surprise just how much ground the girl covered in just a few steps. In an instant, she was on you. Then, she was on you.

Before you even know what hit you, your legs vanished beneath the treads of her shoe.Your scream, a harsh, high-pitched wail, is abruptly cut off as she foot lifts, your pulled lower half sticking to it for the swing. You, or at least the sobbing torso that used to be you, are launched forward into shadow.

Through your tears, you recognize it as the underside of a chair. Seconds later, the chair is yanked backwards, and the two titanic feet that just robbed you of your legs land beside you, framing your bleeding form. A blur of movement, too fast for your broken mind to process, and Caitlyn's chair slid forward as she made herself comfortable. She balanced her feet on their balls, and set them down right before you, unawarely replacing your sky with their speckled undersides.

"Help..." you moan, staring up at the gnarled remains of your legs, now just a dripping mess of torn muscle and shattered bone caking the rubber of her sole.

That's where you remained for the rest of the meal. The sounds of the family enjoying their vacation echoed hollow in your ears as you quietly moaned, the adrenaline fading. And finally, as the meal ended, Caitlyn's foot came down, grinding the last drips of life from you with her heel.

"Fuck, where'd he go?" Caitlyn would ask herself later as she checked her pocket, never thinking to look beneath her steps.
12121212212212112112.title: Back to Cait

choices: Try to talk with the girl
Jump off the hand
Stay as still as possible - is her eyesight based on movement?
1212121221221211212.content:
He's a sensible-looking, handsome chap, that father. He reminds you of yourself, still in the prime of life, with a wide future ahead of him! You dash toward him, confident that he'll assist you where his daughter instead chose the path of torment!

The man's second younger daughter - Kelly, wasn't it? - is clearly also a fan of the torment approach to interacting with inch-tall men, as her hand grabs you in its irresistible grip, squeezing none-too-gently as it lifts you from the table. The fingers part soon enough, showing you her grinning face, and you must act quickly.
1212121221221211212.title: Tabletop Trek

choices: She stays in the bathroom
She goes elsewhere with you
1212121222.content:
"Really now," you say, standing up and dusting yourself down in her palm, "I have rights, you know!"

"Dude, seriously?" Caitlyn laughs,eyebrow raised. "You're lucky I didn't flush you when I first found you. Man, you should be grateful for me taking so much care of you! Is it really such a drag for me to ask something in return? If you prefer..."

Her fingers, those terrifying towers, close around you as she rises, her second hand lowering to the lid of the toilet, effortlessly lifting it... "Hope you can swim."

"No! No! I'll be good! Just... Just don't rub it in so much. I get it, you're so much more in control of this than I am. Leave it at that."

"Fine. You lose the privilege of me talking you through what I'm doing to you."

The fingers close, sealing off all light, leaving you alone in a prison of flesh, completely at the mercy of this teenager.

Lame.
1212121222.title: Whine Whine, Bitch Bitch

choices: Caitlyn's palm-flesh pushes some buttons on the watch
Caitlyn releases you to roll onto the floor
Caitlyn puts you in her mouth to keep you from Kelly
12121212222.content:
An inch tall, enclosed in the sweaty fist of this teenage punk, you caress the watch around your wrist. This is a setback, for sure, but you do have a 'get out of jail free' card right here. Should things get too dicey, zap, poof! you're outta here!

The fingers uncurl above you, and the face of the giantess smiles down at you. "I'm Caitlyn," she announces, "and I am super-pleased to see that you're not imaginary. You are the answer to my prayers, dude. How can I be bored with a little pet to keep me company?"

"All done!" announces a loud, higher pitched voice. You are suddenly clasped between two palms with enough force to drive all breath from your bruised lungs, as Caitlyn hides you from sight. "Whatcha got there?" the voice continues, muffled by the mass of flesh around you, but impossible to ignore. Must be Kelly, the younger sister.

You are palmed roughly as Caitlyn brings her other hand up, empty, to show her sister. Once more you are caught in a fist, one less concerned with taking care of you. It is tight and humid, and you can't so much as twitch a finger toward the watch!

Outside, titans clash as Kelly is not fooled, jumping on her sister in an effort to pry open the fingers of the hand holding you, and you are squeezed ever more tightly.
12121212222.title: Imaginary Friend

choices: Rest in the purse next to the mascara until the plane lands
Climb out and explore her socks and shoes
12122.content: You decide that teenage girls are dangerous, so you duck behind the eye-liner. As the purse bounces, it falls on you, pinning you in place near the bottom of the purse on a pile of pennies. It's safest here, you think. Each of her teeth could destroy you. The light fades as you hear a zipper high above, then a loud female voice "Now boarding, last call to board for Miami!". You grunt and moan as she accelerates to a standing position, then bounces you around inside the pitch-black purse. You scream nonstop until the purse comes to a rest, but she doesn't seem to notice. After a few minutes of rest, the zipper roars open as she reaches in for her phone and headphones. She leaves the purse open as the plane takes off, and she relaxes with some music playing. You can see her shaved legs reaching up high above you into the sky. What do you do next?
12122.title: Hide behind the eye-liner

choices: She wakes up
You climb aboard the massive left shoe
121222.content: You hear a loud buzzing above - is that snoring? and decide to climb out and explore. Your unaware captress has an aisle seat, which you discover as you land on the dirty airplane carpet. A loud booming is approaching and you fall over in shock as the stewardess walks by in navy-blue high heels and nylons. You can smell the sweaty feet inside as they pass. Undeterred, you start walking toward the shoes...
121222.title: Climb out and explore her socks and shoes

choices: Stick with the devil (girl) you know
Head off to explore the plane
1212221.content:
The snoring ends, and you freeze as voices thunder from above; the stewardess asks the teenager if there's anything she can get her, a snack or a drink. As the conversation progresses, the high-heeled shoes before you turn in place to face the seat solidly, shifting weight every now and then from side to side, distorting the carpet fibres so casually.

Behind, the teenager's feet have settled more firmly onto the ground, and one even idly kicks at her bag, a simple blow enough to send the cavernous edifice under her seat with no effort. You are left in the open, between two sets of enormous feet, praying that neither female looks downward to spot your inch-tall form.

You are hungry though, so the idea of freeloading some of the food this teenager is asking for strikes you as genius. She won't notice the small amount you require, so it's not really a crime. No more than smuggling yourself aboard this flight in the first place, anyhow!

Turning back to the teenager, you see her grungy shoes set fairly solid to the floor; now would be the perfect time to scamper up her leg, ready to grab scraps and crumbs from her lap. If you don't go now, she'll become more restless before long and your chance will be gone.

Of course, you're not tied to this girl; if the stewardess is bringing food down the aisle then any other one of the individuals on the flight will be just as capable of providing you with sustenance. Just gotta go stretch your legs, hope no one sees you wandering around, and strike when you find a likely mark.
1212221.title: Snack Time

choices: Make for higher ground on the girl, to snatch up crumbs
Head for the tray itself, to get food closer to the source
12122211.content:
The voices roar on above, the teen accepting a non-vegetarian meal and some coffee, the stewardess taking her time to root around for those items. That gives you a deadline to scramble up this female's leg, so you waste no time.

Her shoes are the first and greatest obstacle. Those behemoths could react at a second's notice, smashing into or onto you with enough force to kill you. Throwing fatalism from your mind, you grab hold of the dangling laces and swiftly mount the top of foot, sparing no thoughts for failure as you reach upward, past the tattered tongue toward the frayed edge of the girls' black trousers.

At your inch-tall height, the threads of her clothes are thick as ropes, and finding handholds to pull yourself ever upward is simplicity itself. All that you need is the stamina to endure the climb, up this incredible distance, from ankle, past shin and up toward the knee. You can't afford to stop. While you pass several giant, gleaming safety pins, as well as gaping holes exposing the sheer skin below, to rest for even a moment on them might leave you hanging when the girl moves.

Out of breath, you finally bring yourself over the edge of the knee to level ground again, the lap of this massive punk. Rolling onto your back, you look up to see the sky falling, your view completely blocked by an incoming tray, folding out from the back of the seat in front of your host. You're safe from being spotted, but still a fair distance removed from your delicious target. Taking the time to recover, you plan the next step.
12122211.title: A Leg Up

choices: Dig into the food
Kick back and watch the movie
head on out of there
121222112.content:
An inch tall on the punk's lap, you can touch the food-rest tray above your head with only a little reaching. So, if you walk along this immense leg, you should be able to reach the edge of the tray, and from there pull yourself up on top of it. Hopefully she'll be too fixated on her meal to notice you pinching tiny amounts of it for yourself. You will be taking full advantage of the free in-flight meal while you're here.

The girl fidgets only a small amount as you walk along her, but even that is enough to make you drop and cling tight to her dark trousers - her merest motion is enough to throw you back to the floor!

Still, even with the occasional quake, you reach a point whereby you can hook your fingers over the tray's edge and - with a grunt of effort - pull yourself even higher. At normal size, you'd never be able to heft your whole bodyweight up by your fingers like this, but at your reduced scale it's childsplay!

You look out across the field of food, a form of ready meal with each type of food - the meat, the vegetables, the gravies - compartmentalised in a plastic receptacle like the foundations of a house. The clear wrap covering them has been torn clear, and steaming pools the size of jacuzzis lie before you, heat and an incredible, amplified aroma wafting clear. Sure, the food is probably quite cheap and lacking in nutrition, but to you it's the food of the gods!

And one of those gods makes her presence known immediately, her massive hand swooping down from above, spearing into the side of a lump of chicken with a deadly, plastic fork. The sound of tearing meat is terrifying, and you follow the journey the food takes, turning your neck to watch waaay up there as it is pulled irresistably into the maw of the girl. There it is crunched and chewed between her teeth, gone forever more.

Yet as her hand and fork dangle above the tray, her eyes never look down in your direction. Turning away from her again, you see that there is a mega-sized video screen built into the back of the seat in front of her. To a regular person it's fairly scrawny, but it's the greatest screen you've ever seen! There's no sound - the girl's headphones taking all of that - but the quality is incredible. In-flight entertainment has never been so impressive!

So, you could dig into the food, confident that the girl won't see you, but there's still the risk of her blindly stabbing down onto you!

You could be safer just sitting to enjoy the movie, if you don't mind doing so on an empty stomach!

Or if neither of those options appeal, you could get down from here, and head back down to safety. You little coward.
121222112.title: A Feast For the Giantess

choices: The girl pulls out a candy bar
It's actually her brother, reaching inside to take the bear
122.content:
The bag is a wondrous cave, full of a variety of gigantic artefacts. You venture inside eagerly, confident that a 'little' girl such as the owner of this bag should prove less likely to spot and rumble you than her older sibling.

You find a cozy spot to wait out the flight, smothered in the warmth of an immense teddy bear - it's surely one thing that won't be taken out until the family arrives at their hotel or whatever; you won't be noticed!

The bag rolls upright, and you roll with it, avoiding any unpleasant mishaps. A good thing that you tested the effects of shrinking prior to coming to the airport, so that you know your own limitations.

Looking up, you spot a truly monstrous hand silhouetted against the light from outside, swooping down for some nefarious purpose. Nothing to worry about - you're not going to be grabbed.
122.title: Teddy Bear

choices: On an overhead shelf
On the floor
1221.content:
Five digits form a claw above you, backlit to create an image of utter terror. It descends with impossible speed, way too fast for something so vast, but you remain steady as it shoots off to your left, hooking around a truck-sized candy bar.

The rustle of the wrapper is creepy, and you watch the muscles of the little girl's hand clench tight before effortlessly hefting the weight up into the sky. You watch open-mouthed, utterly in awe of the spectacle. Hopefully there won't be too many distractions like that during your journey, so you'd better make the most of this experience while you can.

The girl leaves the bag open, so you are not left in total darkness. Settling back, you begin to relax.

Your world is shattered by noise suddenly:

"That it, dear? Well then, let's put your bag out of the way."

The booming voice can only belong to the girl's mother, and the ground around you shifts as - presumably - she picks it up.

Your teddy bear shelter topples as the bag is hefted at an awkward angle, and a chaotic jumble ensues. The woman throws the bag somewhere out of reach, and as you tumble towards the opening you wonder exactly where that is.
1221.title: In Mother's Hands

choices: Go to sleep
Explore
12211.content:
Everything tumbles and collides together as the bag is tossed upward, finally alighting on a top shelf. After a while, you hear a huge snap-bang! as the overhead compartment is closed.

You relax in the bag for a while, a bit bored after the excitement of getting onto the plane. You recline against the teddy bear for a while. You feel like you could sleep, although part of you would like to try to get out of this carry-on and see what other bags are in the bin -- maybe there's something interesting up there.
12211.title: Stowed Away

choices: The girl takes her bear out of the bag
The girl slips the bag onto her shoulders and follows her mother
122111.content:
Mission accomplished, you settle down for a little nap against the teddy bear. With the flight in progress, all you need do now is wait for the family to arrive at their destination and restore your height once they're through customs. Nothing for you to do now but dream of what sport may come once you reach Spring Break...

You don't know how long it's been when you are awakened, the world around you rolling and shuddering as once more the woman lift's her young daughter's tiny bag clear from the overhead compartment. Clinging to the fur of the bear is the only way to keep yourself from tumbling away to be lost in the depths, and you are equal to the task.

Always alert, you look upward, where the bag's mouth is still open, wondering whether you have an easy ride from here on out, or if that monstrous hand will invade your solitude once again...
122111.title: Easy Mode: The Giantess Bag

choices: Go into one of the 2 bags
Go back into the girls bag
122112.content:
As you step out of the little girls bag you see 2 other carions.1 being a really large suitcase and the other being a tiny purse.
Now you could go back into the little girls bag or you could switch perspective s?
122112.title: Change of ride???

choices: 1 - her smooth foot
2 - his size 12 flipflop
12212.content:
You tumble from the bag onto the floor. For a place that once seemed so small the cabin now seems like a stadium. In your dizziness you begin to walk in a way you think is forwards.

Running into something you change direction. Whatever you bumped into seems to be a bit less forgiving.

You hear what sounds like a huge wind behind you and see the blond coed from the terminal and:

1) Her foot coming down on you

2) Her surfie boyfriend slipping his thong off to crush the bug that made his girl scream
12212.title: filthy bug

122121.content:
Absurdly, the thought that flashes through your head as the co-eds smooth foot lowers toward your inch-tall form is 'why is she barefoot on the aeroplane?'

Then the foot impacts, crushing weight flattening and splattering you. The deafeing boom of the impact drowns out the woman's screams as she realises that she has stepped on something...
122121.title: Ew, Gross

choices: continue
122122.content:
The boyfriend saw his chance to be a hero. "Don't worry, babe, I got it!" He raised his flipflop clad foot above you, and slammed it down, and twisted it.

"My hero!"
122122.title: 2 - his size 12 flipflop

choices: The boy sees you and picks you off, leaving the bear to his sister
The girl sees you on the bear, and makes a grab for you
Neither sees you, and you are in the middle of their fight
1222.content:
The hand siezes the very bear that you are confortably settled into, and you have no time to extricate yourself before it is forcibly drawn to the heavens!

Looking out at the sky, desperately trying to avoiding looking that awful distance to the ground, you see that it is the young boy that has snatched the toy, dangling it above the head of his little sister.

Of course, now he is a titanic monster, and the nasty grin that he sports is so much more; it passes across his immense face like a judging frown of God. And it is with contemptuous ease that he waves the bear back and forth, all the while keeping you thinking that you may fall to your death, displaced by the tremendous air currents that his tiny movements cause for your palce of shelter.

"Hey, give him back!" the girl shouts, and you can see her no-less-gigantic hands swiping feebly through the air just beneath you, again with enough force to splatter you should one connect.

This isn't a good place to be...
1222.title: Brotherly Jests

choices: The boy is taking you to the bathroom.
The boy is taking you back to his seat.
12221.content: As they fight, the boy looks up to the object with which he's teasing his sister, and it's then that he spots you. In a second, you move from being waved around on the teddy bear to suddenly being shoved into a pocket. Muffled voices from outside of your prison indicate that the boy has given his sister the bear back, and you wonder what fate is held for you. Your two inch body settles down at the bottom of his pocket as everything sways, and you curse yourself for your foolish pride.
12221.title: Picked On and Picked Off

choices: Go for the pink sandals.
Go for the baby blue sandals.
Go on to the other girls.
13.content:
You nonchalantly move over by the bank of chairs the girls are perched on, and hitting a few buttons on the bracelet, you activate the device. You feel the weird sinking feeling of the device activating. When you open your eyes, the world is once again enormous, and you quickly dash underneath the giant benches, and start heading for the women.

It isn't long before you find yourself underneath the chair of the first one, an Asian goddess wearing thick, pink platform sandals. From your perspective it's a good twenty-five feet to the mammoth sole of her foot. You swallow hard--that's not an easy climb.

Looking over to the chair next to her, you see the feet of the cute blonde you noticed earlier. She's wearing baby blue flip-flops with a thin sole--just about your height by the toe. You could go for those--though she's a long walk away. Then again, the brunette and the redhead lie beyond her...
13.title: The Coeds

choices: Crosses her legs
Begins wiggling her toes
131.content: You decided to go with climbing up the shoes of the mighty asian goddess. You walk up to the huge platform sandal and look up. Taking a deep breath you proceed to climb up the sandal. The sole has a textured design so you have something to grab onto as you make your way up. After a few minutes you manage to reach the deck of the sandal and are standing right in front of the girls huge toes! There is a slight smell coming from them that doesnt really bother you. You know that one wrong move could result in you becoming nothing more than a smear under those monstrous toes. All of a sudden you feel the ground beneath your feet starting to shake. The asian girl unexpectedly....
131.title: The climb

choices: . . . the uniform of a stewardess
. . . the desk of passport control
1311.content:
The motion of the giantess crossing her legs catapults you through the air. At your quarter-inch height, very little proves an obstacle to you, and you sail through the air until you impact heavily with something.

Thanking your lucky stars, you clamber for purchase on the surface, desperate to cling onto life for even a little longer.

Looking about yourself, trying to control your breath, you realise that you have landed upon...
1311.title: Any Guesses?

choices: Jump!
Climb!
13111.content:
Your fingers found their needed purchase on blue threads that made up a colossal vertical wall. A skirt. Luckily, the woman wearing the skirt seemed to be standing still. Looking down, you spotted two massive high heels, with a foot in each one. Looking up showed the uniform of a flight attendant, no doubt waiting for her flight. Flight attendants were almost never still once they got on the plane, which could lead to a major problem. However, where could you go?

Jumping might no be fatal, what with the increased effect of air resistance, but all of the feet that walked along the path would snuff out your life without any extra effort. But how would climbing up be better? There were no pockets on a stewardess's uniform that you could rest in, and increasing your height without a plan wouldn't be good when she began to move.

There wasn't a lot of time. Who knows when her flight would be here?
13111.title: Titanic, Towering Trouble

choices: Maybe if you pull at the belt, she'll think it's coming loose and look down.
There's a loose thread on the skirt near the belt...maybe tug at it.
131112.content:
From where you are holding on, you realize that if you get to the flight attendant's ear, she might be able to help you. There is one problem though: She just heard that her flight's time has changed and she needs to get ready for the passengers. Without giving you a moment to tighten your grip, the attendant begins moving. You hold onto the skirt as best as you can but if you let go...it'll be the end. So as the woman is walking, you decide to try climbing (what can make her stop you wonder)

The terminal is almost there so soon the attendant is going to be in "busy mode" You think of a way to get her to stop walking. During your thinking process, you have happened to reach the flight attendant's waist...the skirt has a belt on it. This might be your option to get her attention.
131112.title: Your Current Climb Movie is "Movement"

choices: Jump for the fingers
Drop onto the skirt again
1311122.content:
No, at quarter of an inch tall, there's no way you're strong enough to affect that monster belt in any possible way. A thread, though? That's much more your insect-capable enemy.

You dig your fingers deep into the strands making up that tiny thread, hooking yourself in good as the stewardess continues to stride along, bouncing you against her impossible thigh every moment. Even as you're struggling to pull, to undo even a millimetre of this garment with your near-infinitesimal strength, you're forced to cling onto it for dear life lest you be flung away by a giant woman for the second time today!

In short, you accomplish nothing.

Still, you're conscious when a finger and thumb come swooping into your field of vision, a disgusted 'tut' from above hinting that the stewardess may have decided to tear off that loose fibre herself. And you can guess that a simple tug of those colossal fingers will accomplish that in a second, where you've been applying your whole body effortlessly for the last few minutes! Oh, and she'll also crush you into the bargain.

Well, time to make another choice. You are trying to sneak onto a plane here, so you don't want to be spotted - but that was before your life became endangered! This may be an excuse to risk exposure, even if it's only jumping off this thread and trying to grip onto the squamous appendages of destruction coming ever closer.

If you prefer to keep a low profile, you'll still let go of the thread, but clamber back onto the skirt. She'll slow while she tidies herself up, so you should be able to gain some ground on this colossus climb while she does so.
1311122.title: For All You're Worth

choices: Tugging something to get her attention won't work...what about biting her hand?
There's a clasp holding the bracelet together--maybe undo it and it'll fall off.
13111221.content:
Since the stewardess is moving, the skirt is moving and she is trying to adjust the thread as she makes her way to the terminal. It is possible that when you jump onto the finger, she'll feel "something" on her skin. At the same time, the hand may move and adjust her hair (near her ear)--if this happens, you can finally get her attention.

Leaping with all you've got, you amazingly make a great landing...away from her hand! You instead land on her bracelet. Apparently the fingers didn't touch the thread but rather they pointed because the stewardess was motioning to another stewardess that the terminal was up ahead. When she put her hand down, you happened to land right on her bracelet.

Okay...so you're not at the ear yet, but at least you're on jewelry. What next?
13111221.title: The finger makes a good point.

choices: Stick with the stewardess
Cut your losses, abandon ship and try again later
131112212.content:
Before you set your quarter-inch form to the impossible task of unclasping the metal monolith secured to this stewardess' wrist you stop to wonder what you're doing (and re-balance yourself, as the arm and wrist continue to swing with the motion of walking). You were trying to get her attention back when she was in danger of crushing you, but that is past, now. You're safe here, and being carried quite discretely on-board a 'plane!

Of course, you have no idea which flight this woman has been assigned; there's every chance it's not the spring break-bound vessel that was your initial destination. She could be headed anywhere in the world!

Do you want to play pot luck with your life, and let this wondrous, colossal woman carry you to a mysterious new land? The alternative is getting off as soon as you're able, but at this late hour there's scant chance of catching the original flight now that final boarding is underway. You'd probably have to spend the day (and maybe night!) hanging around the terminal for another chance! And that would be an exciting holiday in itself...
131112212.title: Wait A Minute...

choices: Wait here and have a rest, wait for the girl to catch her flight
Climb higher for safer ground, while she's still in motion
1312.content:
At your quarter-inch size, each of those toes is enough to kill you. The worst possible thing to happen as you stand before them would be for them to -

Oh no, they're doing it.

Each of the toes begins rising into the air, following a sequence from left to right, and then they descend. To a normally sized person, such as this asian goddess, it would be a slow, casual motion. To you, it's like a disaster movie.

Each toe shudders down with terrible impact, rocking the flimsy flip-flop platform that serves as the floor of your world. The first sends you rolling towards the toes, meaning that the second narrowly avoids crushing you beneath it, and then you are bouncing again.

You rebound from the hard nail of the central toe, hands scrabbling for purchase. Your fingers dig into the skin of the woman, which feels horribly sticky to you; is this what an insect feels like?

Despite the raining obstructions all around you, you drag youself up the surface of the co-eds toe, finding yourself clear of the death-stomp her toes are performing. Still there is motion bneath you however, as you can feel the warm pulse of a blood river through the veins beneath the skin you now stand on.

Where next on your wacky escapade?
1312.title: Rivers of Blood

choices: Microscopic!
Remain as you are
13121.content:
You have a few moments to consider your position. You were almost killed when this woman wiggled her toes a little. How ever are you going to stay alive when she begins walking, throwing you around so wildly? A quarter inch isn't so very small, and plenty big enough to be crushed.

But if you were to shrink smaller... So small that an outsider wouldn't be able to see you, big enough to crawl underneath one of those humungous toe-nails and shelter in safety! The rumblings of the outside world would eb almost nothing, there'd be no danger of falling or of being spotted...

There are naturally downsides to the plan. You've never used the device to go that small before, so there's no telling what the consequences may be. And with no firm grasp on the state of the world beyond your immediate shelter, you'd have no means of telling exactly how close to your destination you were, making exiting a risky strategy.

It's either go with the shrinking, or just sit on the girl's foot and wait patiently for boarding.
13121.title: An Idle Thought

choices: Toenail
Elsewhere
131211.content:
Since you are just riding here, there's no reason to risk being dislodged or seen as a bug, so there's one solution.

The watch does have a setting of 'really fucking tiny' (only phrased more scientifical), so you fiddle with the controls to reduce yourself even further than your current quarter-inch height. Taking one, last look around the upper side of the asian co-ed's bare foot (was that perhaps a wistful sigh?), you activate the device.

The world merely drops away around you, despite the fact that it is you losing the height. It's merely one of the visual distortions amplified by the machine, and you brace yourself for the mild headrush that follows.

The surging of blood beneath you is now a raging, deafening torrent, despite the dozens of feet of skin between you and the veins. Yet it is the dry riverbeds, minute lines in the skin, that you follow, heading for the penunsulas of this woman's toes. It's quite a distance, but the walk should at least occupy a little of the great amount of time you'll have to wait before you get to spring break. On reflection, you wish you'd brought a book or something to read on the journey.

The macro-world outside is beyond conception now, blurred outlines making up the totality of the horizon, all that you can see beyond your immediate environs. No distractions, there. And whatever motion this woman makes will simply not be a problem at your size, as shifts in the landscape will just not register with a person of your smaller'n-a-speck-o-dust stature. She may already have begun walking, but you wouldn't have noticed.

The toe is closing now, as the seemingly bottomless gulfs between it and its comrades are visible and disturbing. Despite the safeties you've run over in your mind several times, the very sight of them does cause you to become apprehensive. Your mass is too slight to suffer negatively from a fall,you keep telling yourself...

Still,should you sit out the trip on the nail,as you had planned, or head for higher ground, nearer the ankle, just because of a 'bad feeling'.
131211.title: Microscopic!

choices: Reverse the shrinking
Wait a little longer
1312111.content:
Upon the walk to the nail itself, you cross a large area of ground covered in a thick, crusty layer of some dark brown substance. Only halfway through your journey across it - which takes some minutes - do you realise what it is. Simply a muddy footprint you yourself left here when you were a mighty quarter-inch tall.

Across, and to the nail. Its surface is a lot less smooth than one would have imagined, pitted and scarred in places across its vast plain, and with odd hillocks of ancient coloured varnish - too small for the naked eye to detect - scattered here and there.

The perfect place to hide out the trip to spring break! Now, how long until you get there?

Only after the third look at your wrist do you realise the one gaping flaw in your plan. While you do indeed have a size-changing machine of miraculous power strapped there, you have neglected to bring a regular chronometer along with. You have no way of keeping track of how much time has passed while you remain here!

You’ll just have to count in your head, and determine for yourself the correct time to return to the outer universe.

You undertake a journey around the locality while you wait, seeing the many sights that the nail has to offer, and venturing even unto the very edge of it, to gaze downward to the unmentionable depths before the sole of the sandal.

So, did that soak up enough time?
1312111.title: Toenail

choices: Try to catch up with the asian goddess again
Strike out elsewhere
13121111.content:
A quick adjustment of the device, and you’re swiftly shooting up in height, regaining your former quarter-inch. However, No sooner do you stand colossus-like over your former stomping grounds than you are thrown from them, toppling from the toe to thud to the ground. The co-ed was still walking!

At least this does confirm your theory that sufficiently small size should render you utterly impartial to regular events - until you grew this big, the land had no disturbances at all! That’s small comfort though, as you land painfully on the ground, curling up into a ball as the four women step over you, marching onwards.

But who cares, right? You’re in Miami now, and once you get back to regular size you can -

Damn. As you look upwards, you espy the familiar trappings of the airport departure lounge. Not much time had passed at all, in reality. You haven’t even made it to the ‘plane! Now, should you chase after the rapidly departing giantesses, or try a different plan?
13121111.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Brave the stampeding air passengers
Return to normal
131211111.content:
You run, all out, pursuing the vast, storming steps of the giantesses as they pace slowly away from you. But it's a doomed endeavour from the start; each of their steps is equal to a dozen of yours, and while they can sedately stride without tiring, already your lungs are burning and you're developing a stitch.

Fine. You stop to recuperate for a bit, perhaps think about what alternate angles to approach as the echoes of those titanesses fades slightly into the distance.

Only... the sound isn't getting any lesser. You can still hear the reverberations of footsteps all around you! Turning on the spot, you behold more people walking toward you from the other direction, each of their house-sized feet swinging closer with a rapidity that gives you cause to gulp down your fear.

It's quite a gauntlet that you'd have to run to survive, dodging the shoes of a crowd of giants who move faster than you. You still have the size-altering device, and could use that to restore yourself to regular height - then you'd be perfectly safe from death, but your secret would be out, and who knows what would ensue thereafter? But what good is such a secret power if you're too dead to use it?

Better decide fast if you want to risk being crushed beneath the oncoming tide or grow to normal size and certainly survive.
131211111.title: Come Back!

choices: Welcome to a macro-sized world
Over the edge
131211112.content:
Looking around, you need a way aboard that bird, anything. Something comes into view and you had to say 'anything.' Not too far away towers the titan form of a ten year old boy, from the family of five you'd seen earlier. There were a few problems with this option; to start, that kid was your neighbor, second, you knew him for being evil, and lastly, his enormous feet were caked in mud and grass still a bit wet from playing outside before coming here.

This is far, far from ideal but you just need to get on the plane, if you can last that long, you'll be fine. Bolting forward, you quickly cover the open distance between him and you, at his feet, your first problem is the inch tall rubber heel four times your height. Before he can step away, a leap and hurried climb gets you onboard, but he isn't yet boarding, just pacing in the line. While he circles, mud, grass and sweat rain down on you as the sides and straps of his sandal loomed overhead as if to tease your stature.

Sitting here would be a death-sentence anyway. There was nowhere to go when someone stepped on the shoe, especially the hell where you were and if the kid kicked at anything it'd send you flying as you couldn't anchor down to anything. It appeared there were two routes to take; up on top of the foot or behind the strap and next to it. Being that close to the underside of a ten year old boy's foot wasn't something you'd do normally and certainly not with that foot dwarfing you at the length of a football field, 20 ft or so at the toes and probably a hundred by the ankle.

The best way up was right in front of you, the straps. On the right side, of the right foot at the heel you stared up an immense black wall for a strap, starting at 70 feet wide with a round gap in the mid-bottom that the boy probably couldn't get a finger through. The back end was just the right thickness for you to wrap your body around it and climb. Jumping on and inch-worming up at signifificantly less than an inch covered, you moved towards the top.

Near the end of your climb was the first of a few obstacles, the heel strap. Here, your perfect climbing spot turned and went horizontally around the foot to the other side of the heel. With a look at the materials making up the side, you swung your tiny feet out to land them on a clothe outcropping meant for decoration; its top where it jutted out was plenty large for your tiny feet. A few minutes later, and after much struggling, you were standing against the flat side of the top of the side piece, not far from the actual strap.

Leaping up, you latched your fingers to the stitching for another outcropping and pulled yourself up, sticking your feet in the weave for support, reaching a hand up and climbing it. At the top, it all went bad. Despite the tiny size of your feet and the enormous-cable like size of the threads, you got a foot caught. Ripping away hadn't done any good and your brand new skating shoes remained trapped.

You had to reach some safer spot than here, shoes or none. Lifting up, you slipped out of the shoes, losing your socks to the steel-like weave as well. Unfortunately for you, as soon as you set foot on secure ground, barefoot, the shoes fell free to bounce against the heel below. What rotten luck.

Things under you now felt odder and in some places you were poked by incredibly sharp clothe, but were pretty much fine as you walked across the enormous velcro-secured strap and dropped to the huge foot. Your feet were immediately buried in mud when you touched skin, it came up just past your ankles. As you walked clear of that, the warm skin felt weird beneath your barefeet, it was certainly an unusual experience.

Suddenly, you realize the giant has stopped walking, now having an easier time to do so yourself. Looking up you see he's looking at his foot as if a fly or something was walking around and disturbing him. Quickly you dive under a pile of mud and he eventually looks away, not having spotted you. When you continue, he stops and looks again, then you see the enormous toes of his left foot looming in the skies and coming in to scratch away the itch...

Somehow you gotta hide, either get a lot smaller or go over the edge, off the foot but on the sandal.
131211112.title: HIde and Seek

choices: Grow
Ride out the plane ride here
1312111122.content:
You were going to shrink, already had the watch set and had hit the button, but it was going too slow. Running to the edge, you tried to wait out the shrink, but couldn't or for that matter get the chance. Parts of the mud had solidified, you were standing on a small section that was crust at the skin but still wet on top. A slight twitch of the enormous muscles of the foot and the mud slid free over the side. At this point you were a quarter inch yet as the device was just starting.

Everything shot by as you slid down the foot, kind of like skating down a steep hill. On the way down, you blacked out. A while later, at least, you assume its a while, you come to, stuck against the mud. With some fighting, you pry yourself off the mud and look around to see an enormous environment all around you.

A great distance away you see a peach-color wall with a great deal of brown material is present, but entirely out of focus, across from it and you a black monolithic structure stretches to the sky and splits to go out of site above and to the sides. There could be another structure connecting to this one farther down, but you can't say for sure. What light streams to you comes mostly from a hole in the nearer of the structures, the peach and brown wall seems to be lit i places from beyond the monolithic structures, but all of that is beyond focus.

Your immediate surroundings form from a mile long crater at the least that curves around at the corners, but is mostly box-shapped, though narrower at the far end. At the near end, the walls are much lower and beyond you can see five more craters, but much, much smaller. In places, there are great lakes though you are unsure just what makes them up; it looks like water, but doesn't seem like it. The last thing is just beyond your present crater, two things actually on either long side. They are just longer than your current home, one has strings crossing it before dropping to a farther off area, though nearest is a huge hole with a black conduit emerging. The other object simply is a black wall of the same shape into the sky, but has numerous grooves and shapes cut into and out of it.

At last, it clicks in. This was your footprint from before shrinking. Your watch settings had been to be small enough that there'd be a gravitational field strong enough to cancel out the effects of the boy's movement. This however was a slight overshoot, you must have bumped something in your hurry as a quarter inch made 7 miles and an inch nearly 30. The boy here, would tower into the skies and probably space at 1530 miles tall, and this was just a ten year old. You didn't want to imagine a teen or older, you were smaller than anything else in existence to either a little boy, pre-teen, teen or adult. A single piece of muscle was at least a city, you couldn't move anything more than a nano-particle.
1312111122.title: Over the edge

choices: Grow bigger to fight off the beast
Stay small and safe
13121112.content:
No, you should at least give yourself time to return to where you started before even contemplating re-enlargement. You even discover several intriguing new sites on the way. Still, all too soon you are back against the border to the woman’s flesh, where no layer of nail is present to protect you from the warmth and scent of her skin.

It’s quite something. Intoxicating, almost. It’s almost enough to distract you from the approaching shadow and droning, whipping jet engines.

The fly lands on the foot ahead of you, its eyes looming bigger than blimps. You could be impaled upon the thick hairs jutting from its towering legs, and as you consider the monster, you’re not entirely sure that you’re safe from it wanting to eat you…
13121112.title: Monster

131211121.content:
No sooner do you begin to grow, than the fly buzzes away, its droning falling in volume even as it dwindles in size.

You reach a titanic quarter-inch again, and wallow in the sensations of the outside world. The foot still has its pleasures, but you can also hear its owners voice echoing down from above.

“OH GAAAWD! A BUG!”

The foot shakes, flipping you from its surface to impact upon the floor. You can’t activate the size-shifter for a few moments after interaction with the outside world, so you’ll have to hope that nothing happens in order to allow you to get out of this situation before you’re stepped on.

Fat chance, with four bug-hating co-eds looming over you. You can hear their flip-flop clad feet stomping around in consternation, and then the sky turns baby blue, darkening as the surface lowers swiftly, mashing your form beneath it, oblivion welcomed as the woman’s weight mangles and tears your fragile form.

You didn’t even make it to the airplane.
131211121.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Yes
No
131211122.content:
Flies’ eyesight is based on movement, right? You’re not getting that confused with anything, are you? So, you just stay perfectly still, and the beast will get bored, and abandon you without schlepping you up its disgustingly dripping tunnel of a face…

The eternity passes, and the monster buzzes off again, leaving you alone on the foot again, albeit this time with a seeming sound vacuum following the fly’s cacophony.

Question is, is it time to grow up yet?
131211122.title: Buzz Off, Bozo

choices: Head for the blonde
Forget her, pal
1312111221.content:
The big world becomes slightly less massive. Once again a quarter-inch tall, you look around to see that the foot isn’t walking anywhere, in fact standing quite still alongside its partner. The solid heels of the blonde giantess sit directly ahead, as if the two women were waiting in a queue for something…

“Everything seems to be in order,” a voice cries from above.

Passport control. See how impatient you are? Ah well. Still, now’s perhaps a chance to jump ship if you aren’t happy with your current spot - the blonde is just a short distance ahead, and you could run over there to ride her feet instead if you’d like to try.
1312111221.title: Are We There Yet?

13121112211.content:
You scramble down to the floor and tear off towards the heels of the blonde co-ed. They don’t stay still however lifting off like tremendous airliners themselves, and leaving you choking in their wake. You guess that the queue must be moving forward a little, and are proven correct when the feet stamp down solidly not much further ahead.

Then the asian woman moves forward as well, carelessly treading you into ground as she lands her sandal upon you. You are killed in an instant beneath her unrelenting weight, splattered and smashed beyond all recognition.

Still, while a greater part of you is trampled further into the grained floor of the corridor by the procession of people that cluster after the co-eds, a small piece remains stuck to the sole of the woman’s sandal, and so completes its journey to Miami after all.
13121112211.title: Queued Up

choices: Yes
I keep telling you, no!
1312111222.content:
No, that would be a waste. You have obviously imagined the time staring down a monster to have been longer than it was in actuality. No, you have time to lie back, stretch out and have a good relax for a few moments.

It’s incredible how little you can feel from the phenomenal giantess all around you. Her movements are as nothing! Even looking directly up, you can make out little beyond the drifting dust motes clogging up the skies, glinting in shafts of light a thousand different colours. Truly, the creator of the shrinking device only considered the scientific applications of it, not the truly beautiful artistic vistas that a changed perspective can open up.

As well as a watch, you wish you’d brought a camera. But you really did pack light for this trip.

So, is it time to re-enlarge yet?
1312111222.title: Full of Stars

choices: Scurry up to the giant shoe
Get out of the crowd as quickly as possible
13121112221.content:
The sensation of returning to a quarter-inch height isn’t as exciting as the shrinking down, but as the macro-world comes back into focus, you gaze around from atop the woman’s foot.

You don’t have long to do so before it lifts at an abrupt angle, toppling you downward onto a hard, metal surface. Gazing down the shelved plateaus proceeding downwards, and the attendant gigantic feet that rise up from each at intervals, you surmise that the co-eds are currently in queue to board the ‘plane. You were so close! If only you could have been a little more patient!

Still, no reason to beat yourself up over it - first you have to ensure that you aren’t squashed flat by an impatient passenger, and so scuttle to the very edge of the stair, watching as the latest arrival - a titanic converse, its toe-end decorated with liberal coatings of felt-tip pen - smashes down nearby.

What’s the plan now, genius?
13121112221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Stick with this person
Abandon them once they've brought you aboard
131211122211.content:
Well, to ignore these passing people at this time would leave you stranded halfway up this staircase - not good. So, best of all to get out of here, and onto the 'plane. It's hardly even a choice.

You approach the gigantic shoe before you. Hopefully, the delay as the stewardesses greet the passengers should keep it in place long enough for you to clamber aboard and secure yourself. You apply the full strength of your quarter-inch frame to the job, digging fingers into almost-imperceptible holes to lever yourself upward, atop the snug, scribbled dome that encases the toes of this person.

Ahead, the slack laces criss-cross upwards, toward an ankle that you're choosing to ignore for the time being. You just need to get yourself amongst the threads, and you can secure yourself well enough that walking won't shake you free.

It's a hectic scramble, but a thick strand binds you to the shoe by the time it launches skyward again, and your struggle becomes one to hold down your breakfast as the rush overtakes you, all-too-soon followed by the tremendous impact of the next stair being achieved. Then more waiting, and a slow climb. The monotony of the process would send you to sleep,were it not for the disturbances of this person walking, carrying your bug-like self along with no extra effort.

Now, when this mule has actually brought you onto the 'plane, are you planning on staying with them, or scurrying off to sitout the journey somewhere alone?
131211122211.title: Scurry up to the giant shoe

choices: Sure, why not
No, best not be too sleazy
13121112222.content:
Nah, best to over-estimate than under-, right? Settle down for the long haul, and it’ll be over before you know it. Enjoy the sights, supply the sounds yourself, and this’ll be something to tell your grandchildren about.

Who knows, you may even meet their grandmother in Miami…

Pleasant visions of yourself impressing the beach-babes flash through your mind as you settle back on the toe, and via circular thinking you eventually bring yourself to thinking of the girl who’s transporting you. She and her friends weren’t exactly unattractive, and upon your re-sizing they would be the nearest women to you. Perhaps you should prepare yourself for a meeting with them, and working out a way to get close to them.

Heh. You’re pretty close already, you guess. But not exactly intimate.

Chat up lines and cheesy grins are considered and cast aside one by one, and you lose track of time in pondering them. Would it be time to upsize and put one of them into practice yet?
13121112222.title: Something to Tell your Grandchildren

choices: Go exploring
Evesdrop on the Co-eds
131211122221.content:
Aaaand, up you go!

The rush as you return to a quarter-inch height is intense, but you are careful to maintain your balance upon the woman’s foot. Looking around, she does seem to be standing steady for the moment, which is a relief and no mistake. Before you (and her!) stand another humongous pair of female feet, toes hidden and heels raised to the heavens by some rather fancy blue shoes. Conservative tights covering long, long legs up to a blue skirt, and you conclude that this woman is a stewardess. Certainly,the cacophonous “Enjoy your flight!” greeting would seem to confirm that.

Should you jump ship now, and find somewhere pleasant to sit out the flight now that you’re actually aboard the plane, or stick with your sexy co-ed transport for the near future, to get a better grasp of her personality and what it may take to win her heart?
131211122221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Stick with the stewardess
Get to know your fellow passengers
1312111222211.content:
In moments, this spot is going to be chaos. The co-ed whose foot you're standing on will step away, and the tide of passengers behind her will board, sweeping over you relentlessly, crushing you if you're too slow. Ergo, you need to find a place of shelter.

Your quarter-inch body moves with a slick easiness as it drops from the flip-flop to the tangled, rank surface of the aeroplane carpet. But your target is in sight, and you will not allow a simple nasty environment to put you off.

Halfway, and the shadow of the co-ed's raised foot passes you as her entire,lumbering bulk moves onward to look for a seat. There's a terrible crash as it lands down again, and the procession of giants begins to board.

But they won't catch you. Not here, with the stewardess to protect you. For now you stand in the arch of her foot,between the high heel of her shoe and the toes of her foot. Never mind that such a short distance above you an unimaginable weight is held at bay by the flimsiest of protections, she's standing still. She greets each newcomer warmly, but never moves from her spot. So you sit there, spared a crushing death by the elevating heel of her shoe, watching as your fellow passengers - albeit ones paying for their flight - stomp past you.

You have plenty of time to consider what to do once the 'plane takes off. You could stay with this lovely, helpful stewardess. Not only will you get a free flight,but you'll be able to see something you never have before - exactly what the staff do behind closed doors.

If that sounds a little bland though, you could always explore the 'plane, and see what interesting characters are taking this trip with you.
1312111222211.title: Arc of Sanctuary

choices: It certainly is intriguing
Who cares?
131211122222.content:
No, it would be absurd to quit this rather enjoyable platform so soon! Who needs to enjoy this woman at regular size, when you’re fraternising with her in a manner that no one else in the world has ever done before! This in itself is a unique opportunity, and you should make the most of it, while it lasts!

You pace back and forth across the mostly featureless plain that the woman’s toe has become to someone of your infinitesimal size. Not much to look at, and the feel beneath your own feet is unlike any woman’s skin that you’ve ever imagined. Sound doesn’t really reach you here either, and you can’t say you miss sensation enough to try risking the taste.
