And yet… Still there’s something out there that calls to you. Perhaps it’s a sixth sense, but a sudden sensation comes over you, tingling throughout your body with a thrilling rush. Should you enlarge to check it out, or stay here and revel in it?
131211122222.title: A Disturbance in the Force

choices: The co-eds have done alright by you thus far
Time for an expedition!
1312111222221.content:
The bigger you get, the more the feeling affects you, your stomach complaint bringing home what it really was. The plane has taken off, a sudden lunge in pressure carrying down even to a tiny mite like yourself.

Now at a much, much bigger quarter-inch, you look around the woman’s nice, still foot, seeing the leg above bend at the knee to indicate sitting, and the monolithic form of the seat before the woman blocking light from above, a great wall cutting off much of your view.

To either side however, you can see the feet of the other co-eds, anxiously pressed downed into their flip-flops, truck-sized toes paling with the effort. Ahead, beneath and beyond the seat back, you can spot the distant shapes of other passengers, but they’re too distant to discern any worthy detail at this point.

Should you stick with the four girls you’ve chosen for the flight, or go wandering past the other giants while you’ve got the time to pass?
1312111222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Risk death by jumping down from the woman's foot
Climb the woman's leg
13121112222211.content:
Yes, you'll stick with them. But just because you're sticking with the group doesn't mean you have to remain with your generous hostess, the Asian co-ed. No, perhaps you'll leave her and -

There is a smash, away to the left, beyond the toes. It is sudden, the impact of a great mass which is hurridly withdrawn with a speed you can barely comprehend, just seeing a foot swung overhead and around again. At a quarter-inch height,you'd expected giants to move in slow motion, but your diminunation has not slowed them one bit - in fact, they're scarily fast and could be upon you before you realise it.

Yes,if you were to venture to the floor of the 'plane, there's no way you could avoid an incoming foot before it crushed you. The danger of going off to visit one of the other girls would be astronomical.

And yet... you'renot entirely happy sitting here, between the towering toes. A trip like this,you decide, should be in the lap of luxury!

Thinking of which, that shouldn't be too hard to literally achieve! You look up, your gaze travelling up the incredible distance of the woman's deceptively smooth leg. You could climb that, and get to her lap. Safe, less smelly and more fun. It would be quite a trip upwards, but at any point where you got tired you could always shrink down to a smaller size and rest in one of her pores.

So,which is it to be?
13121112222211.title: No Reason To Go

choices: Best check it out, just to be on the safe side...
It was probably nothing
1312111222222.content:
Oh yes… That’s a good buzz. It passes all too quickly, and with no more indication of what it may have been, but it’s sudden lack leaves you panting hard and unsteady on your feet. If that’s a common side effect of shrinking this tiny, perhaps you’ll do it a little more often!

Not soon after, in wake of your realisation that the visual medium isn’t so entertaining from this angle, a shadow passes over you. Light - not plentiful to you in any case - is snuffed out for several seconds, before glaring back down again with more vengeance.

What was that? Should you upsize to check it out, or simply huddle in fear and hope it was nothing?
1312111222222.title: A Brief Shadow

choices: They love you really!
Off you trot
13121112222221.content:
And you’re a quarter-inch again. What’s changed? Ah, the gigantic foot upon which you’re standing has removed its flip-flop. That’s all. The strap passing over your hiding place was the shadow.

Then the foot and toes stretch across the carpet beneath you, throwing you from your place to land uncomfortably on the floor. Head down, you rush from the rampaging monsters, hoping to keep from them and avoid being crushed.

Still, it would seem that you’re on the plane now, judging by the sitting position of the giantess, relaxing her tired footsies behind you. Phase one accomplished.

Is it really worth bothering sticking around with the co-eds, or should you just go and explore since they so unceremoniously threw you off?
13121112222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Head into the girls' bags
Investigate the girls' feet
131211122222211.content:
If you're honest, it's really your own fault that the co-eds are treating you unceremoniously. What else could you expect, hitching a ride on their feet? If only you'd managed to smuggle yourself somewhere higher up, this would be much more enjoyable! As it is, your quarter-inch self can only stand and watch as the gargantuan feet of each of these four young women dance and stomp the thick fibres of the aeroplane's carpet. The tremendous distance up their shins to the knee and beyond is further than you can fully see.

You look around, and espy the structures opposite where the giantesses sit. They've placed their carry-on luggage under the seats of the passengers in front of them, and if you really wanted to get closer to them you could go investigate those bags. Alternatively, you could navigate the deadly field of feet, looking for the girl with the steadiest footing. You could climb up her while she sat still, and reach higher ground in that manner.
131211122222211.title: They love you really!

choices: Approach this row of people
Head further into the passenger area
131211122222212.content:
Screw 'em. They've done their job, lifting you aboard this flight. Now you're free to enjoy the journey in the presence of some more interesting passengers.

At your quarter-inch size, the aeroplane is going to be a nightmare to navigate. Hell, to you, each individual passenger is bigger than an airliner! The time it takes you to walk anywhere will be considerable, and the flight may well be over if you dither too long. Therefore, you have to make a decision about which people you're going to visit and stick with it - to falter halfway through a journey would be to waste precious and irreplaceable time.

Strolling along the seats of the co-eds toward the aisle (the four girls have adjacent seats, with no others between them and the window), you check out the giants sitting across the way. You're at a fair enough distance that you can discern minor details. The nearest to you is a young businessman who - under the pretence of reading a newspaper - is stealing a sordid glance at the co-eds at every opportunity. There are three other people behind him, but he mostly blocks your view.
131211122222212.title: Exploration

choices: THIS you gotta see...
Meh
13121112222222.content:
No, nothing can touch you here. You should just enjoy the novelty of a mild change in your surroundings, since so little of the décor here will pass while you sit oh so tiny.

What, now a trembling pulse through the thick skin beneath you? A fluctuation in the otherwise constant temperature emanating from the pulsing blood beneath even that? Interesting. Can you somehow sense subtle differences in the temperament or mood of a greater person when at this size, signals that would otherwise go unnoticed? Despite your slacker attitude to most situations (this very trip being just one example), your scientific curiosity is piqued ever-so-slightly. Is it worth growing up a little to check out exactly what it is that’s going on up there?
13121112222222.title: Anticipation?

choices: Ooh!  Giant cakes!
You're not hungry
131211122222221.content:
“What coffee do you have?”

Strange words to greet you as a quarter-inch height brings you back to interaction and notice of the outside world. You gaze around the now shoeless foot of the co-ed for a moment, noting the blue carpet scrunched beneath her mighty toes before looking upwards at the aircraft-carrier plus scaled refreshment trolley that a goddess-scale stewardess is pushing down the aisle of the plane.

You do have to admit that you are sort of hungry - perhaps you should dash off for a bit to grab some of the snacks from the trolley. You’re having a free ride after all, so why not a free meal to go with it?
131211122222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Tr and get food while a quarter of an inch tall
Grow bigger to make things easier
1312111222222211.content:
It's a good thing that there are four giantesses ordering from the food trolley. Without that delay, it might well have moved on before your quarter-inch tall form could even sprint to its wheel. Once there, you cast your gaze upwards, seeing that it's quite a climb to get to those delectable snacks that you so crave.

Of course, you could use your machine to grow that little big bigger to make it easier, only to risk being spotted as a pest by the stewardess. How badly (and quickly!) do you want to eat?
1312111222222211.title: Ooh!  Giant cakes!

choices: A quick peek
Snooze, but don't lose
131211122222222.content:
Pff. Why bother investigating such trivialities? You’re not here to learn - you’re here to party!

You scream this very desire to the heavens, laughing soon afterwards at your silliness. You dance for an encore, air-guitaring all the while. To do this in the shadow of a gigantic woman, standing upon her toe no less, is a fantastic experience! Only when the sweat running down your entire body gets too much do you cease, slumping down and quietly chuckling as you struggle to catch your breath.

How much time have you wasted, anyway? You just want to collapse right now, but perhaps it wouldn’t be the best thing to fall unconscious upon a woman’s foot. You’re fairly sure you’re safe, but you wouldn’t want the aftermath of your rash entertainment to find some minor flaw while you’re asleep, would you? It would be downright embarrassing, except for the fact that no one would ever find out.

Still, you could just stop for a rest here if you really wanted. Or perhaps you should upsize a little first, just to check that nothing’s awry.
131211122222222.title: Live in the Moment

choices: Sleep amongst the co-eds
Find a more secluded spot on the plane
1312111222222221.content:
As you grow bigger and bigger, topping out at a mighty quarter-inch, you find relaxation and comfort. The biggening is akin to a soothing breeze, and the sweat drenching your limbs doesn’t grow with you as much, meaning that you’re already fairly relaxed by the time you stop. Presumably, increasing your muscle mass compensates for temporary weakness earned at a smaller scale. Good to know.

So, how’s your host doing right now? And what’s that irritating sound, like a car’s radio passing by…

You raise your head up, looking from the bare expanse of the woman’s foot, up her imposing shin to the knees, arched out of sight. She’s sitting again, you conclude. On board the plane, you surmise, judging by the drab décor running parallel to the length of leg and continuing on that distant ceiling, further above you than the sky itself.

The music does seem to be coming from above you - she must be passing her time during the flight by listening to a few tunes. Can’t say that you blame her, as you’d have done the same had you bothered to remember to pack anything for this trip!

Hrm. You cast your eyes around, seeing the giantess’s lovely co-ed companions sharing her side of the seating here. They all seem fairly relaxed, so it should be safe to have a little nap in their vicinity. On the other hand, now that you’re aboard the plane, there’s no requirement for you to stick with them. You’re free to explore, should you so wish!
1312111222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Yes.  Yes it is.
No one else can smell you - who cares?
1312111222222222.content:
Screw it. Nothing can affect you at your size, nothing. You’re young, you’re virile and you have a shrinking machine. You’re gonna be famous, you’re gonna be loved, you’re gonna be rich. You’re gonna live forever…

And then the unconsciousness slides over you, rendering your dreams real for you, dancing enticingly behind your eyelids, and causing you to undoubtedly twitch in your sleep.

And do you wake to disaster?

No. Everything is as you left it. You were right. Ha! You were right! However, your clothes, having been sweated and then slept in, do fairly stink now. Is it time to grow big and swipe a new get-up, yet?
1312111222222222.title: In-VEEN-see-BOL!

choices: Exit while the going's good
Hey, what's the rush?
13121112222222221.content:
Quarter-inch. The co-ed is no longer wearing her sandal. She still seems to be sitting, as you gaze up the sloping mountain of her shin to bent knee, but the bland surroundings of the tiny-Olympian room that this is some sort of… um…

The cascading torrent of liquid, echoing all-too loudly throughout your head, immediately place events. She’s paid a visit to the rest-room.

Cripes. Should you jump off her foot and run for cover now, or stay put and hope for the best?
13121112222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: This shall not stand!  Time to grow and get some answers!
Time to cower in fear...
13121112222222222.content:
Yech. You’re definitely going to need a shower, first thing when you hit Miami. Or maybe join some luscious woman flesh for a touch of skinny-dipping?

Ah, the dreams still resonate in your skull.

Wait, is it just you, or did the air just get thinner here? Hold that thought, for now someone’s turned out the lights! What the hell?
13121112222222222.title: Dreams

choices: Try and get out from beneath her ass
Try and tickle her so that she moves for you
131211122222222221.content:
As you rise to a quarter-inch height, no light is shone upon the mystery of the darkness, but gravity does reassert itself upon you, toppling you upwards to the proper down.

Ouch.

You drop off the foot, landing on some thick fabric, but the flesh isn’t too far away, grazing your head. A quick movement on the behalf of this giantess could easily crush you beneath her bulk. She must have dragged her feet up and under her as she sits, and you had best be very careful if you want to survive this…
131211122222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Enough terror!  Back to the macro world!
Hah!  You knew you could outlast it!  Stay small.
131211122222222222.content:
You’ll wait it out. Shivering, huddled in on yourself and sweating again - in panic this time - you’ll wait until the darkness passes, allowing its unnatural aura to add nightmares to sweep aside the pleasure-dreams you oh-so recently enjoyed. You weep.

An eternity later, light returns! Are you eager to rush out from this microscopic world of unnamed terrors, or are you capable of lasting a little longer here?
131211122222222222.title: Let There Be

choices: Get back aboard
Scuttle somewhere else
1312111222222222221.content:
Larger, a quarter-inch now, you yelp as you see the strap of the woman’s flip-flop rushing toward you, perfectly positioned to strike your tiny head from your shoulders! You throw yourself off the foot, just as it inserts itself back into the sandal, presumably removed at some earlier point of the flight.

Oh yes, you’re airborne now, as the monolithic seating and surroundings can attest. Can’t be far either, if this giantess is putting her footwear back on. Should you re-mount her now, to sally out one final time, or head somewhere less terrifying, to enjoy a little of the plane at a larger scale before you hit Miami?
1312111222222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Enough!  Grow already!
Stay the course,stick with the plan...
1312111222222222222.content: Light, light, light! And then a shadow passes over again, causing you to flinch. It is gone very quickly, but the sudden-ness with which it struck above you has you questioning the sense of staying here again. This was a mad plan! You should just re-size now, and get the hell away from this crazy goddess and her tricksy ways!
1312111222222222222.title: Paranoia

choices: Forward, to leave the plane under your own power
Back to a different foot or bag to carry you out
13121112222222222221.content: The crackling voice of the pilot over the intercom heralds your ascent to the heady height of a quarter-inch. Good, soon you’ll be in Miami. You don’t spare any time for the giantess co-ed and her sandal-clad foot, instead jumping down to the carpet inside the passenger seating and deciding upon a direction to scurry in.
13121112222222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Upscale the size, upscale the pleasure..?
Stay here and enjoy it while it lasts
13121112222222222222.content:
No. Stay the course, man. It’ll be totally worth it once you get to Miami. It’s bound to be a little scary, being tiny beyond comprehension, but there are upsides too, right?

In perfect timing, the Feeling comes over you again. You have no idea what it could be, but you give in to the sudden, fleeting pleasure while it lasts. You spasm in your joy, and wonder if you should celebrate by re-sizing now.
13121112222222222222.title: Take Two

choices: You are kicked by a stray foot
You fall underfoot briefly
131211122222222222221.content:
You return to a quarter-inch height, but don’t have long to celebrate, as the motion of the foot beneath you, walking about who-knows-where, throws you through the air. There are more and more feet, all around, descending a metallic staircase of the gods! Oh, if only you’d waited a little longer, until after disembarkation had happened!

The elation quickly dissipates, and you can’t activate the device while you’re under the effect of outside forces - you need to be still and unbothered before you can alter your size again. You just have to pray that fate is merciful as you tumble amongst the stomping peds of an eager crowd of holiday-goers…
131211122222222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Waste no time!
Eh, there's no rush...
131211122222222222222.content:
No, you merely let your body accommodate its exhileration on its own terms, letting your mind loose its panic reins for the moment. Enjoy it, memorise it.

You quickly return your attentions to the thought of how much time has passed on this journey, and try to coincide the strange Feeling with some event.

Of course! Could it be some amplified pressure-change effect on your altered frame? And it happened twice. Take-off… Landing.

You should be in Miami now! As if to congratulate you on this triumphant conclusion, a loud explosion threads through your thoughts, some noise from the outside world loud enough to register even with you.

Hmm, is that a signal to re-grow now, or an indicator that it’s not entirely safe?
131211122222222222222.title: Eureka!

choices: Go with them when they get out
Stick around for a while
1312111222222222222221.content:
A quarter-inch is a good height to scope out possible risks without needlessly worrying the colossal co-ed who provided shelter for you.

Her foot is as you left it, be-sandaled and sexy. Something immense passes over you, casting you into shadow, and you look up to see the tremendous form of the asian’s blonde friend moving past her before settling her mass down beside her equally gigantic friend, atop a surging black platform which accommodates the foot’s leg beyond the knee.

A quick one-eighty, and similar structures rise before the women, and a rumble underscores all that you hear, trembling your platform and grumbling through your ears.

A car engine? The girls caught a taxi? Hmm. Would it be worth following them to their destination, or take this opportunity to part ways, and remain in the taxi until a more likely proposition arrives?
1312111222222222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Yeah, I suppose
No, third time's the charm
1312111222222222222222.content: No, best not to chance it. Instead, you spend untold minutes worrying over possible causes for the sound, roused from your puzzlement only by a repeat performance, only mildly quieter. Would now be a good time, then?
1312111222222222222222.title: Bang.  BANG.

choices: Time to split and return to normal
Time for the aftershow part-ay...
13121112222222222222221.content:
Even the second signal to leave has you hesitating, and you grow to a quarter-inch several seconds after it happened, which may have been fortunate. You find the foot standing steady as you reach a quarter-inch height, its leg rising high up into the summer dress again, and almost captivating you with its divine beauty.

No! You must be strong, must find some indication of what the current situation is, and get it done before this woman begins walking and throws you from your perch.

Let’s see… That’s a desk she’s facing, and that’s not cheap wood. The carpet around is fairy luxurious, almost your height, and most comfortable looking. Around your host, the other co-eds are gathered, goddesses come together with their mountainous luggage in tow. Distantly, other giants stomp back and forth, highlighted by the glorious daylight shining in from one side.

At a guess, this is a hotel? You’ve arrived! Now you can jump off here, find somewhere private to grow back to natural size and book a room here yourself! Or hit the town.

A devilish thought slides into your mind, however. Why go to all that bother, when you can stick with the girls as they check in, and get a private show in their room? It’s certainly tempting, no?
13121112222222222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Third and more - time to grow!
They don't count - stay small!
13121112222222222222222.content:
It could have been anything. You mustn’t impose imaginary signs upon random events. What manner of scientific adventurer would you be if you did that! No, you’ll stick here as long as you can, until necessity of hunger or sleep drives you to grow up. It’s safe here, safe and cosy…

In time, pattering intrudes upon your thoughts. Succession of many noises, quiet(er) explosions of sound that reverberate through your world. Is someone trying to tell you something?
13121112222222222222222.title: Pitter Patter

choices: Man-size
Mouse-size
131211122222222222222221.content:
You are a quarter-inch again, and you have no time to take in your surroundings. Like some war movie, you have incoming! Droplets of water, showered down from above, are exploding all around your position on the woman’s foot! They’ll kill you at this size, so you need to grow up fast!

Back to normal would guarantee safety, but you’d have a lot to explain to the woman. Maybe you should just grow to the size of, say, a mouse - but that would open up a whole world of its own problems.

But there’s no time to over-think it - choose quickly!
131211122222222222222221.title: Are We There Yet?

choices: Stick With the Hotties?
Exit the Room and have a hotel adventure?
1312111222222222222222211.content:
Seeing that becoming Mouse Sized likely won't save your neck, you instead elect to using the watch to enlarge yourself to full size - thankfully Professor Martin had been clever enough to ensure that the watch sized shrinking device you carry had some means of waterproofing, but you don't want to test the theory too much.

As you shoot up to full size you do appear to have something of a miraclous escape on your hands - though now your size the utterly naked (and not bad looking, even from behi-compose yourself man!) woman you've been hitching a ride on has her back to you, and more importantly appears to be shampooing herself, attempting as best as possible to remove no-longer life-threatening to you shuds from her beautiful eyes, her form joyfully away from the glass, partially see through door into the bathroom of her hotel room.

Taking this blessing and thankfulness that none of the other three girls appear to be in the bathroom and the fact that the shower is big enough not to have physical contact (which would be particularly akward) you as quietly as possible open the shower door (helped by the girl's light humming and the loudness of the shower itself) and into the bathroom itself.

You risk the quickest glance you can manage to scope out your surroundings before using the watch to reduce yourself to the safer height of an itch too, taking care to move far enough from the shower first in order to avoid possible squishing once the former transport you used exits her washing cycle. The bathroom appeared - and still at your new size appears - to be relatively well stocked of girly items, though not so many that you would guess that the four coeds are sleeping in two pairs of bedrooms, meaning that you have at least one other goddess likely to be in your immediate idea - the blonde, red-head or brunette, you wonder? - and thus giving you two titans to work with.

You have at least fulfiled your main objective of reaching Spring Break without having to pay for a plane ticket, but your choices have left you with a new choice - whether or not to stick with the Coeds, or try and escape this room and grow to full size before possibly and enjoying Spring Break alone. You're not in the best state either - your quick visit to the shower has left yourself and your clothes rather wet and damp, not the most fun situation to be in. On the other hand, you'll be seeing a fully naked giantess in a moment, and having at least two girls to play around with certainly sounds like a interesting holiday. Plus there's sure to be a way to either get new clothes or else dry off your current ones with your shrinking device, and getting a proper bath would simply mean waiting for the girls to vacate before growing up to full size and using the showers.

So, shall you stick round with the girls a little longer or vacate the premises and try exploring the hotel instead?
1312111222222222222222211.title: Man-sized and Wet

choices: Try and scrounge some of the woman's food
Look for a meal of your own
13121112222222222222222111.content:
There's no rush to get out of here. You may as well enjoy the scenery before rushing about to immerse yourself in the whole Spring Break culture.

However, you remain a gentleman, so you troop your way out of the shower room as the woman cleans herself, determined instead to find some food to sate that hunger that's been building in your belly for quite some time now.

You roll under the door into the main bedroom of the hotel suite. The furniture is as outsize as you imagined, and dominated by the form of the second occupant. It's the blonde co-ed, sitting cross-legged before the cacophonous blaring of the tv screen like a sexy Buddha. From her perspective the room isn't too spacious, so her prodigious bottom dominates the space between bed and screen, forming a barrier to a person of your size. Sure, you could squeeze past her easily at this size, but that would be getting so close as to risk being spotted.

Then you notice her hand rising from the arena between her legs, a five-clawed crane of flesh dangling an item the size of you briefly, before it is fed into the inescapable void of her mouth, so far above you. She has food.

Well, there's one solution. You're hungry, and this babe has some snacks as she enjoys rotting her brain with the idiot box. You'd have to be mad to attempt getting some of it though, as there's every chance she'll just snatch you up and devour you yourself, if only by accident.

The other alternative would be to reach for some higher ground - a bedside table, the mini-bar? - and see if you can spot any less-dangerously situated grub. Of course, the danger there would be in the climbing and finding, but once you've got some food you can sit back and snack on it, watching the women going about their business in the room for a while as entertainment.
13121112222222222222222111.title: Stick With the Hotties?

choices: Sleep off the journey under the bowl
Become a big man to recuperate
131211122222222222222221111.content:
You cautiously walk forward, confident in your inch-tall ability to remain hidden, but wary of the regular-sized woman's power to stand and squash you without realising or warning. Each step makes her even bigger, and the regular motion of her hand to the bowl is somewhat hypnotic, if incongruous with the junk that's blaring from the tv screen like an ad from Bladerunner.

Eventually you near her bareskinned backside - her lower half is dressed only in underwear! - and you gasp in awe. She's one fine figure of womanhood. But enough of that. On the other side of this mountain of flesh is a field of food, enough to sate your hunger. You wipe more water from your eyes and plan how you're going to be getting past.

Then shudders thrum through the floor, accompanied by the regular tread of a giantess. Without turning, you can tell that your asian escort has returned to the room, her voice drowning even the inane commercials. "Shut that off. We need an early night after that flight. It's spring break tomorrow, and I don't want to miss a second of it!"

You look over your shoulder, sighing appreciatively at the beauty clad only in a towel. Tomorrow, eh? Maybe that's when your full-size self will introduce himself to these lovelies...

Distracted for a moment, you are unprepared as the blonde storms to her feet, shouting "HELL YEAH! SPRING BREEAK!" the noise is bad enough, but her foot crunches down right next to you, her heel narrowly avoiding your body. In slow motion you turn to regard the titanic flesh-weapon, but then the bowl comes down. Giant popcorn rains around you, displaced by the woman jumping to her feet, but your immediate world has become a lot smaller as the upended bowl covers you like a bio-dome.

That's something to worry about in the future as you rush over to cram your mouth around the tasty sugar treats. Their texture is too hard for your teeth atthis size, so you're reduced to sucking caramel oand butter off the surface, licking it like algae off a rock.

Through the distorted glass sky, you see the two giantesses high-five before moving off to their respective beds. Looks like you'll have a night of rest before heading off to party in the sun with the beautiful people. But should yous stay here, small as you are, trapped and alone with food you cannot eat, or should you upsize to your regular scale to tidy yourself up a little? There's a risk of being noticed as some creepy stalkerif you do the latter, but staying small has problems that speak for themselves.
131211122222222222222221111.title: Trapped!

choices: It's the blonde
It's the asian
1312111222222222222222211111.content:
You give it a few minutes; once you hear the contented and disturbing sound of snoring coming from both beds, you hit the device. You were loathe to assume mouse-size earlier, but now that there's some food here you figure it's best to be able to partake. Remianing under the bowl, you cram popcorn into your mouth, crunching it noisily. It's far from a balanced meal, but you're hungry enough not to care, cramming your gob with sweet treats.

The effort of munching through the outsize snacks is exhausting, and before you know it you're drifting off to sleep, There, the dreams are all of girls dancing on the beach, Spring Break unfolding before you. The sun beams down on events as water is splashed in all directions, but then there is the boom of thunder, without a cloud in the sky...

You snap awake as a foot crashes down beside the bowl, and you gaze up at the giantess waking from her own sleep.
1312111222222222222222211111.title: Safe Enough

choices: Tell her the truth
Tell her a lie
13121112222222222222222111111.content:
Mm, she has nice legs, that blonde. They're so tall, leading up to more distant and harder to discern torso. Now it's hard to make out anything at all as her hand moves closer, spreading out as it grasps the bowl and picks it up.

You've no time to react as the other hand is upon you, fingers wrapping tightly around you, pinning your arms within, leaving you unable to manipulate the device. As the blonde rises to her full height, still dressed in skimpy white nightwear, you have a sudden flashback to a certain movie about a fifty-foot tall woman...

You are brought before her face, where a mouth hangs open in shock, and those giant eyes won't stop blinking. Perhaps you should take charge of this situation, explain things a little..?
13121112222222222222222111111.title: Attack of the Fifty Foot Woman

choices: Shrink back down
grow back up
13121112222222222222222111112.content:
At your new mouse-size, you goggle up at the massive form of the woman who transported you in here. There's distortion from the bottom of the bowl, but you can make out vague details beyond her feet, bare legs ascending to scanty nightwear that is even now enlarging as she leans forward for the bowl. Immense fingers peel apart as their hand reaches out to grasp, then there is a loud gasp.

Of course! Just as you can see her, so this transparent prison allows her to spy you lurking down here! The hand retracts, and you wish that you could see the expression on her face! She's going to make a decision on how to treat this vermin in her hotel room - either kill it herself, or call room service? - and you want to be out of danger before she does.

You could shrink back down again out of her sight, or else grow to full size and hope that you can explain things clearly...
13121112222222222222222111112.title: Busted!

choices: Tell her the truth (or at least some of it)
Make up some story
131211122222222222222221111122.content:
The world around you dwindled, your body stretching to the sky. It felt good to be normal sized (or close enough- you may have added a few inches for good measure). In shock, the girl stumbled backwards, bumping into a nearby dresser. Panic in her eyes, she fumbled around and grabbed a nearby lamp, holding it out in front of her like a weapon. "Who- What- What the fuck?!"

You gave her what was hopefully an apologetic smile. "Hey, sorry about the disruption." Rubbing the back of your head, you continued. "I didn't mean to spend this much time here, really, but way leads on to way, you know?"

She blinked.

"Uhh," you began. "I guess I'll just be going." She didn't move, except to keep her protective lamp firmly between her and you. Carefully, you walked toward the door. You turned the knob and left, making sure to close it behind you.

That was easier than you'd thought. You gave your wrist a quick check.

The shrinking watch was gone. Fuuuck. The shrinking watch was still in the room. How the fuck did it get loose? No, how the fuck were you going to get it back? God, this was going to be such a pain.



Knock knock knock

For all of your genius, all you could think to do was to ask for it back. After a few seconds, the door opened just enough to let you see the face of the girl. She still looked a bit out of it.

"Hi again," you said. "I left my shrin-something in here, and was wondering if I could maybe, perhaps, hopefully grab it reeal quick like?" You gave a cheesy smile.

She didn't respond for the longest time. Just as soon as you were convinced you'd broken her, she spoke in a voice that was little more than a whisper. "People can't shrink."

Not what you were hoping she'd say. "You're right, of course. People can't just change their size. That'd be silly. But, I really need to get something. It'll take just a sec, I swear."

She locked eyes with you. "It's your shrinking device, isn't it?"

It was your turn to be surprised. "Sh-shrinking device? What, that's just, no. Nooo nooo nooo. It's a, uh, watch, that's all. Family heirloom. Worthless, really, but it means a bunch. My grandpa owned it. Priceless to me. Yeah." Fuck me stop talking.

"You're lying, and not well." Her earlier shock was fading, and fast. "I found your watch. It's high tech and fancy and labeled on the side 'Shrinking Watch©'."

"Can... Can I have that?" Your mouth was dry. This was going all so wrong.

"Tell me why you were in my room." She was beginning to look angry. What were you going to tell her? The truth? It sounded bad, to be honest. But could you really make up a believable story?

"Well?" she said. "You gonna explain?"
131211122222222222222221111122.title: Maybe a Mistake

choices: Snatch and grab at the first opportunity
Get to know the girl a little
1312111222222222222222211111221.content:
"Yeah, ya got me,"you smile, shrugging and scratching at the back of your head. "This was me, testing a shrinking device. I got lost and trapped under that bowl, and I'd just like to have it back, if that's all right."

A raised eyebrow is the first response. "Just... hand this over? A device that can shrink the wearer to the size of a mouse? Uh, how about 'finders, keepers'?"

You're losing her. Still, it seems that she bought your story; she's unaware of the ability to shrink to such a tiny size that a person may stow away on, for example, a woman's toe. "Well, you don't know how to use that thing! It would be incredibly dangerous to use without supervision!"

"Hey, if you managed it, I should be able to manage. Huh, looks like a simple dial right here..."

"YOU NEED ME!" you shout, perhaps too loudly for this time of night.

"Quiet!" she hisses back. "I don't want Sarah waking up!"

"I'll stay quiet if you don't just slam the door in my face."

"Fine! Let me just throw on some clothes..."

Seems she's accepted you, if grudgingly. You need that watch back, or your life will be over when you get back home. But should you just lure this woman away and then steal the device (for the greater good!) or play the longer game, and show and teach her about the device.
1312111222222222222222211111221.title: Blather

choices: Shrink to half an inch
Grow to twelve feet
13121112222222222222222111112212.content:
You're beginning to wonder if she'd just up and left by the time the door opens again. She's now fully dressed, in tight capris, a pink tank top, and the oh-so-incredibly important watch. "Teach me," she says, holding up her wrist and pointing at the device.

"Not here," you reply. "Follow me." You lead her down the stairs and outside, looking for a place with few cameras. If one or two grainy videos were taken, it'd be no problem, but the high resolution devices in that upscale hotel could be used to trace the watch back to you. You're practically dragging her through the parking lot, but finally has enough and stops you before you're off the property.

"Oh no, big boy. You're not going anywhere with me until I know exactly how this works." She begins to fiddle with the knobs, before giving you a devious look. "Otherwise, I guess I'll just go back and figure it out myself."

You grimace. Looking around, all you see in the way of cameras is one dinky little thing by the door, over four yards away; not ideal, but this place'll do. "Alright, first things first. What you have there is a very potent, very rare, very valuable piece of tech. It's not a weapon, it's not a toy, but it is dangerous. If you still really want to do this, I want to know the risks. Shrinking looks fun, but it's goddamn dangerous and scary. Harmless pets become giant monsters, normal people turn into moving mountains, and every little thing can suddenly kill you. Is that clear?"

She smiles. "Is that supposed to frighten me, Mister I-Tested-The-Device-Out-In-The-Room-Of-Four-Gorgeous-Coeds. I'll be careful, at least as careful as you."

Dammit, that was supposed to frighten her. "Alright, as long as we're on the same page. Now, the watch has a lot of different controls. This here adjusts molecular stability, that modifies power drain, here we can change the field of effect, and that changes the screen color." You pointed out each knob and dial as you went, impressed by how much you remembered. The professor would be proud, over looking the whole theft thing. "However, the most important controls are that knob there, which adjusts size ratio, and that button there, which'll activate whatever sequence you put it. Got it?"

"Mmmm. What's this here do?"

"That lets you 'share' the shrinking effect with whatever you're holding. It's set right now to just shrink your clothes with you, but can be upped to affect whole buildings or vehicles."

She smiled. "Perfect. Set it so you'll shrink with me."

"I'm sorry?" you said. Every time you thought you knew what this mad woman was thinking, she'd go and say something like that.

"Yeah, shrink with me. I'm not doing this by myself. I just met you; what if you try and mug me after I shrink, or you had just lied to me and the settings you provided will turn me into pink goop. Make it affect you."

With a grimace, you comply. "There. It'll shrink whoever you're touching. Happy."

"Very," she says. Without warning, she grabbed your chest and pulled you close to her. "Let's have some fun!" You have time to blink, before she smashes the button and the two of you...
13121112222222222222222111112212.title: Pilot and Co-Pilot

choices: Grab the watch back
Get to know Ali better
131211122222222222222221111122121.content:
Shaking your head, you clear the shrinking sickness away. The girl doesn't seem to be taking it as badly, the surrealness of your giant surroundings perhaps giving her enough adrenaline to carry her through.

"This is fucking intense," she squeals, spinning around and then almost stumbling over a now-massive pebble. "Dude, I don't know how to thank you for letting me see this!"

"How about telling me your name?" you ask, stepping toward her slowly.

"Oh, didn't I say? Well, I'm pleased to inform you that the girl you were stalking is named Ali. That's me. Unless you were in my room for my friend, in which case her name is Sarah. Oh man! Sarah would just flip if she could see me now!"

This girl has a chronic lack of attention span. It shouldn't be too difficult to distract her if you wanted to snatch the watch back. Then again... She is hot. And grateful. Why not take the time to get to know her now that you have someone to share the shrunken experience with? This could be the start of a beautiful Spring Break!
131211122222222222222221111122121.title: Half an Inch and Half Insane

choices: Beg for forgiveness
Tell her there's more to the watch that she needs you to explain
1312111222222222222222211111221211.content:
This Ali's a ditz. It'll be a piece of cake to snatch the machine right off her wrist, and get back in control of this situation. Above her adorable grin her vacant eyes stare off into the distance, luxuriating in the giant scenery. Slowly, slowly you step closer, your own mouth smiling even as your eyes are lowered to the blinking device strapped to her arm.

"So, where should we go first?" Ali says perkily, turning at just the wrong moment. Your outstretched fingers make their grab, and end up plucking at her boob.

"What the hell..?" She slaps your hand away and steps back, now blinking incessantly. "You fucking creep! I can guess why you were sneaking into our room now!"

"No, it's not like that -" you begin, realising that the truth isn't much better. You stop speaking when it's clear that Ali can't hear you, Her form swelling back to regular size, and your half-inch self looking at the toe-end of her bright pink sneakers. Crap.

Ali stoops over you, and you don't even bother trying to run as she reaches for you with her humungous hand, finger and thumb squeezing around you and lifting you up. This is new. This is first time you've been shrunk with a regular person aware of you...

"Thanks for the watch," Ali says, the fury of her breath washing over you like the fires of Hell. "Now, I'm thinking that maybe the world would be better off without a little pervert like you. "

No no no, there are reasons to keep you around!
1312111222222222222222211111221211.title: She's Big Again

choices: You grab tiny Ali before she escapes
She's too quick for you
13121112222222222222222111112212111.content:
"I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry..." you squeak, trembling in Ali's grip. That gigantic face before you cracks a smile, and the rage is replaced with mirth.

"Heh," she snorts, drowning out your own voice and smothering you in her breath. "It seems so petty to kill someone so pathetic, so helpless... Nah, I've got a better idea, after all..."

She gives you a wink, then drops you into the palm of her other hand, where her fingers wrap around your half-inch form in a loose fist. The world is sealed off by an all-encompassing world of flesh and bone, hot blood pumping noisily behind every whorled surface around you, the pitch darkness no clue as to what is causing the rolling thunder around...

Minutes later, the bright world wakens you up as fingers uncurl, and you sit up in Ali's palm. The girl is standing in one of the bedrooms of the hotel, facing a bed whose occupant has herself buried under the covers, only a mass of blonde hair showing.

"Sarah, where are your earrings?" Ali asks.

"D' you know what time it is?" the blonde mumbles. An immense arm emerges from under the sheets, waving vaguely at the side table.

Ali strides over to a small box on top of a suitcase, her own gigantic hand popping it open and rummaging around. As she crouches, her other hand - the one in which you sit - lowers to the ground and tilts ninety degrees, dumping you onto the thick carpet.

Before you bolt for it, you glance up at the mass of Ali, and she is looking back, tilting a smile across one side of her face. You freeze, and then her fingers slam down ahead of you briefly returning to the sky and leaving the earrings before you.

They're in the shape of songbirds - in cages. Those cages are well-sculpted and realistic, and while the birds are cheap, lumpy plastic, those are thick bars there. Still more than enough space for you to slip between them though, not a cage that could hold you!

While you're examining the earrings, Ali's looming shadow disappears. You turn, to see that she has used the watch again, shrinking down to your level. Well, almost. When she stops shrinking, she still towers twice your height, making you a child in comparison. Her heavy hand slaps you heavily on the shoulder. "Say hello to your new home, perv," she smiles, forcefully marching you toward the cage.

You are powerless to resist, and go along with her when she strides over, boosting you into the cage before pulling herself up. You ponder the shoddy quality of the bird as she joins you, remarking: "You do know I can just climb out of here whenever I want, right?"

"At your current size, sure," she laughs, her hand landing on your shoulder yet again. This is followed by the familiar 'click' of the watch, and the world shrinks around you as the two of you grow again, the woman doubled over as, between you, the two of you and the bird almost totally fill the cage.

The pressure is released as Ali unclasps her fingers. "See you shortly, Jiminy," she says, her voice decreasing in pitch as she shrinks again, to leave you trapped as she slips out of the bars. Unless you're quick enough to grab her!
13121112222222222222222111112212111.title: Some Use

choices: Ali places you atop her head
Ali puts you on the tip of her surfboard
Ali pushes you into her belly button
13121112222222222222222111112212112.content:
"Well, it would be a but hasty to get rid of you," Ali admits, "as there's probably more to this doohickey than I think."

She looks you over, rolling you around a little between finger and thumb and scratching at your fragile body. "I got an idea. I'll give you a chance to pay for what you did, and I can even make it an ironic punishment! You wanted to soy n me and my girls, see what we're up to? Well, you'll get your wish! And if you manage to survive the experience, we'll see if it's worth keeping you around."

"Huh?" you manage. "Don't you want to use the watch more?"

"Well, yeah, but I can do that anytime. Our spring break plans, well, they kinda rely upon the time and tide..."

With that enigmatic comment, she squeezes you into a hip pocket, and your half-inch self is pinned in place by the tightness of the fabric. Even if the trousers weren't so well-fitting, the damage you sustained in her grip has left you too weak to struggle.

So you recoup your strength, feeling the immense power of Ali's muscles as her thigh shudders at every step she takes. Talk takes place way above you as your captor chats with her buddies, and then even more travel.

You lose track of time, and not only because Ali has your watch. There is an upside to this, in that she hasn't killed you yet, and is probably just trying to scare you straight. You need to get your panicked breaths under control and look forward to trying to convince her to restore your height.

Fingers pry you free eventually, and you are raised once more to Ali's face as she kicks off her trousers. you are raised up past her toned stomach, revealed now that she is dressed in a blue bikini. But you quickly drag your gaze up toward her face, for fear of giving her even more evidence of your creepy voyeurism. No, you'll reason your way out of this.

Ali smiles widely. "Good morning for it. Smell that sea air, bro."

She turns you to see what she can, and the mostly empty early morning beach with waves rolling across it, a desert of sand leading to an eternity of ocean. And in the corner of your eye, you can see the skyscraper of a surfboard that the co-ed cradles with her other hand.

"We're going to hit the waves, and you're along for the ride. If you manage to stick it out with us, we can talk about what to do next with the watch."

Yikes. The fingers move you swiftly to where Ali plans to have you hold on as she strides out into the sea...
13121112222222222222222111112212112.title: Blue Crush

choices: Advise Ali to reduce you both to normal before someone sees you
Go along with whatever Ali suggests

1331.content:
You need look no further; you've found your mode of transport. Rubbing your hands in glee, you approach the redhead's mighty flip-flop, already imagining how you'll approach her at fullsize later, and how surprised she'll be when you reveal how ell you know her.

This spring break is gonna be a blast.

Of course, if you're going to get there, you need to somehow scale the footwear, and at quarter of an inch tall that's not as easy as it sounds.

Still, perseverance gets you through, even if it does leave you drenched in sweat and exhausted, collapsing before the toes of your goddess-saviour. They're... so... big...

Sleep now.
1331.title: The Redhead

choices: Mysery Holiday!
Go Home
1332.content:
You sprint past the immense feet of the redhead, your eyes fixed on the distant target of her brunette colleague.

However, your speed is just too slow. As you are beginning to near your target, she stands up with an awaful quaking of the ground. As she rears to her full, terrifying height, you feel shock run through your entire body.

One foot, easily the size of a small town, lifts ponderously into the air, soaring over your head with an ease you would never have imagined possible for something so vast. It impacts again with a shudder that throws you to the ground, and then time resumes its course, the hectic pounding of the giantesses going to catch their flight sounding like the world itself is ending.

You are fortunate not to be stepped upon in their flurry of activity, but your opportunity has now gone. You watch forlornly as the titanic figures become marginally less huge as they recede into the distance. Looking around, you see that both the family and the businesswoman have also gotten up and gone to board. No chance of making spring break now.

Still, you do have a shrinking machine. Maybe you should catch a lift with one of the many other people around, go somewhere else for a holiday. Or you could just go home, and forget this ridiculous scheme.
1332.title: Too Late

13322.content: You were fortunate to survive from being stepped on. Maybe it's time to give up and go home. With that thought, you return to normal and go home. After all there's always next time.
